source: And did all drink the same spiritual drink: for they drank of that spiritual Rock that followed them: and that Rock was Christ.
target: Ɓe fuu ɓe njari njaram ngootam iwɗam haa Allah. Ɓe njari haa tapaare iwnde haa Allah, yahdunoonde bee maɓɓe. Kayre woni Almasiihu .

source: But with many of them God was not well pleased: for they were overthrown in the wilderness.
target: Bee non fuu, Allah yerdaaki ɓurna maɓɓe. O maayni ɓe nder ladde .

source: Now these things were our examples, to the intent we should not lust after evil things, as they also lusted.
target: Kuuje ɗe'e ɗon kolla en misaalu, ngam taa en tokko suunooji kalluɗi bana ɓe tokkori .

source: Neither be ye idolaters, as were some of them; as it is written, The people sat down to eat and drink, and rose up to play.
target: Taa ndewe labbi bana woɗɓe maɓɓe. Deftere wi'i: “Yimɓe njooɗi ngam nyaamugo e yarugo. Nden ɓe ummi haa ɓe pija .”

source: Neither let us commit fornication, as some of them committed, and fell in one day three and twenty thousand.
target: Taa mbaɗen daakaareeku bana woɗɓe maɓɓe mbaɗno, nden ujine noogas e tato  maayi nder nyalaade woore .

source: Neither let us tempt Christ, as some of them also tempted, and were destroyed of serpents.
target: Taa poonden Almasiihu bana woɗɓe maɓɓe, kamɓe ɓe maayi ngam boɗɗe ŋati ɓe .

source: Neither murmur ye, as some of them also murmured, and were destroyed of the destroyer.
target: Taa ngurŋgurte bana woɗɓe maɓɓe, nden malaa'ikaajo maayde halkidi ɓe .

source: Now all these things happened unto them for ensamples: and they are written for our admonition, upon whom the ends of the world are come.
target: Masiibooji ɗi'i fuu ngarani ɓe ngam faamtingo woɗɓe. Ɗi mbinndaama ngam reentingo en enen yeeɗanɓe haa timmoode zamanuuji.

source: Wherefore let him that thinketh he standeth take heed lest he fall.
target: Ngam maajum, tammiiɗo o ɗon dari fuu, sey o hakkila ngam taa o do'o.

source: There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man: but God is faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape, that ye may be able to bear it.
target: Jarribooje keɓɗe on fuu, kanje keɓata woɗɓe. Ammaa Allah o koolniiɗo, o accataa on njarribe haa ɓura semmbe mooɗon. Yaake jarribeeki warani on, o hokkan on dabare hisugo, ngam haa on keɓa semmbe munyango ɗum.

source: Wherefore, my dearly beloved, flee from idolatry.
target: Ngam maajum, soobiraaɓe am, ndaaye cujidanki labbi.

source: I speak as to wise men; judge ye what I say.
target: Mi ɗon wolwana on bana marɓe hakkiilo, nume ko mbi'anmi.

source: The cup of blessing which we bless, is it not the communion of the blood of Christ? The bread which we break, is it not the communion of the body of Christ?
target: Ciftore jardugel kiirtaari ngel ngetteten Allah ngam muuɗum. Naa ngel ɗon hawta en bee ƴiiƴam Almasiihu yaake njareten na? Ciftore tamseere nde cenndeten boo. Naa nde ɗon hawta en bee ɓanndu Almasiihu yaake nyaameten na ?

source: For we being many are one bread, and one body: for we are all partakers of that one bread.
target: Woodi tamseere woore tan. Ngam maajum, koo to en ɗuuɗɓe, en laati ɓanndu wooru, ngam en fuu en ɗon kawta nyaamugo tamseere woore.

source: Behold Israel after the flesh: are not they which eat of the sacrifices partakers of the altar?
target: Ndaare Isra'iila'en: Nyaamanɓe kusel dabbaaji kirsaaɗi dow hirsirde ngoodi kawtal bee Allah .

source: What say I then? that the idol is any thing, or that which is offered in sacrifice to idols is any thing?
target: Mi yiɗi wi'go kusel ndabbaawa kirsanaaŋga lawru woodi saman na? Malla lawru woodi saman? Naa non sam!

source: But I say, that the things which the Gentiles sacrifice, they sacrifice to devils, and not to God: and I would not that ye should have fellowship with devils.
target: Ammaa mi yiɗi wi'go ko rewooɓe labbi kirsata, ɓe ɗon lii'ano ginnaaji, naa haa Allah. Mi yiɗaa boo on mara kawtal bee ginnaaji .

source: Ye cannot drink the cup of the Lord, and the cup of devils: ye cannot be partakers of the Lord's table, and of the table of devils.
target: On mbaawataa yarugo nder jardugel Jawmiraawo e nder jardugel ginnaaji boo. On mbaawataa nyaamugo haa kiirtaari Jawmiraawo, nden on nyaama haa taabal ginnaaji boo.

source: Do we provoke the Lord to jealousy? are we stronger than he?
target: Malla en ngiɗi ummingo kaajal Jawmiraawo na? En ɓuran mo semmbe na ?

source: All things are lawful for me, but all things are not expedient: all things are lawful for me, but all things edify not.
target: Woɗɓe mooɗon ɗon mbi'a: “Koo ɗume fuu dagake.” Ooho, ammaa naa kuuje fuu nafata on. Koo ɗume fuu dagake, ammaa naa ɗume fuu mawninta nuɗɗinki goɗɗo .

source: Let no man seek his own, but every man another's wealth.
target: Taa goɗɗo suklano ko nafata hoore mum tan, ammaa ko nafata yimɓe woɗɓe.

source: Whatsoever is sold in the shambles, that eat, asking no question for conscience sake:
target: Ko soorrete haa luumo fuu, nyaame bee numo ɓernde laaɓŋgo, walaa haaje ƴamgo haa toy ɗum iwi.

source: For the earth is the Lord's, and the fulness thereof.
target: Ngam deftere wi'i: “Jawmiraawo mari lesdi e ko hebbini ndi fuu .”

source: If any of them that believe not bid you to a feast, and ye be disposed to go; whatsoever is set before you, eat, asking no question for conscience sake.
target: To goɗɗo mo nuɗɗinaay ewnake on ngam nyaamdu haa saare mum, to on njaɓi ewnaandu maako, nden kam nyaame bee numo ɓernde laaɓŋgo ko o jo'inanta on fuu walaa haaje ƴamgo haa toy ɗum iwi.

source: But if any man say unto you, This is offered in sacrifice unto idols, eat not for his sake that shewed it, and for conscience sake: for the earth is the Lord's, and the fulness thereof:
target: Ammaa to goɗɗo wi'i on: “Kusel nge'el iwi haa ndabbaawa kirsanaaŋga labbi”, nden kam taa nyaame ngel, ngam daliila anndinɗo on ɗum, non boo ngam daliila numo ɓernde.

source: Conscience, I say, not thine own, but of the other: for why is my liberty judged of another man's conscience?
target: Mi wi'aay dow numooji ɓerɗe mooɗon, ammaa dow numo ɓernde oya man. Fakat, numo ɓernde goɗɗo fotaay hiitaago ndimu am.

source: For if I by grace be a partaker, why am I evil spoken of for that for which I give thanks?
target: To mi yetti Allah ngam nyaamdu am, koni goɗɗo hallintammi ngam daliila nyaamdu ndu ngettumi Allah dow mum?

source: Whether therefore ye eat, or drink, or whatsoever ye do, do all to the glory of God.
target: Ngam maajum, to on ɗon nyaama malla to on ɗon njara malla koo ɗume ko mbaɗoton, mbaɗe ɗum fuu ngam tedduŋgal Allah.

source: Give none offence, neither to the Jews, nor to the Gentiles, nor to the church of God:
target: Taa laate daliila fergere koo moy nder hakke, koo Yahuudu'en, koo Yunaniŋke'en , koo jama'aare yimɓe Allah.

source: Even as I please all men in all things, not seeking mine own profit, but the profit of many, that they may be saved.
target: Mbaɗe bana mbaɗanmi. Mi ɗon tiino haa koo moy yerdammi nder koo ɗume fuu. Mi ɗaɓɓitittaa ko nafatammi, mi ɗon ɗaɓɓa ko nafata yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe, ngam haa ɓe kisa.

source: Be ye followers of me, even as I also am of Christ.
target: Tokke misaalu am, bana min mi tokkori misaalu Almasiihu .

source: Now I praise you, brethren, that ye remember me in all things, and keep the ordinances, as I delivered them to you.
target: Mi ɗon mana on ngam on ɗon ciftorammi foroy, on ɗon tokko ekkitinol ngol mi ekkitini on boo.

source: But I would have you know, that the head of every man is Christ; and the head of the woman is the man; and the head of Christ is God.
target: Ammaa woodi ko ngiɗmi faamtingo on: Almasiihu woni hooreejo gorko fuu, gorko woni hooreejo debbo mum, Allah boo woni hooreejo Almasiihu.

source: Every man praying or prophesying, having his head covered, dishonoureth his head.
target: Nden kadi to nder mooɓtorde gorko ɗon waɗa do'a malla ɗon waɗa annabaaku bee hoore mum ɗon suddi, nden kam o teddinaay hooreejo maako, waato Almasiihu.

source: But every woman that prayeth or prophesieth with her head uncovered dishonoureth her head: for that is even all one as if she were shaven.
target: Ammaa to nder mooɓtorde debbo ɗon waɗa do'a malla ɗon waazo suddaay hoore mum, nden kam o teddinaay hooreejo maako, waato goriiko. O laati bana laɓɗo hoore mum.

source: For if the woman be not covered, let her also be shorn: but if it be a shame for a woman to be shorn or shaven, let her be covered.
target: To debbo suddataa hoore muuɗum, koni o laɓataa hoore maako? Ammaa to ta'ugo gaasa malla laɓugo hoore debbo ɗum cemtuɗum, nden kam sey o sudda hoore.

source: For a man indeed ought not to cover his head, forasmuch as he is the image and glory of God: but the woman is the glory of the man.
target: Gorko suddataa hoore mum, ngam o ɗon waŋgina jaati e tedduŋgal Allah. Ammaa debbo ɗon waŋgina tedduŋgal gorko .

source: For the man is not of the woman; but the woman of the man.
target: Gorko tagaaka diga debbo, ammaa debbo tagaama diga gorko.

source: Neither was the man created for the woman; but the woman for the man.
target: Gorko tagaaka ngam debbo, ammaa debbo tagaama ngam gorko .

source: For this cause ought the woman to have power on her head because of the angels.
target: Ngam daliila malaa'ika'en, debbo mara suddaare dow hoore mum. Kanjum waŋginta baawɗe goriiko.

source: Nevertheless neither is the man without the woman, neither the woman without the man, in the Lord.
target: Ammaa haa Jawmiraawo kam, gorko jooɗataako bilaa debbo, debbo boo jooɗataako bilaa gorko.

source: For as the woman is of the man, even so is the man also by the woman; but all things of God.
target: Bana debbo tagaama diga gorko, bana non boo gorko danyaama diga debbo. Tagle fuu boo haa Allah iwi.

source: Judge in yourselves: is it comely that a woman pray unto God uncovered?
target: Nume bee ko'e mooɗon: To debbo nder mooɓtorde ɗon toro Allah suddaay hoore mum, ɗum pottuɗum na?

source: Doth not even nature itself teach you, that, if a man have long hair, it is a shame unto him?
target: Koo ɗabiya yimɓe boo ɗon anndina on, to gorko yoofti gaasa hoore mum juuti, ɗum cemtuɗum.

source: But if a woman have long hair, it is a glory to her: for her hair is given her for a covering.
target: Ammaa ɗum daraja ngam debbo to yoofti gaasa hoore mum. Ngam gaasa njuutka hokkaama haa debbo bana suddaare.

source: But if any man seem to be contentious, we have no such custom, neither the churches of God.
target: To goɗɗo yiɗi waabaago dow haala ka'a, sey o annda: Gikku ngu'u walaa haa amin, walaa boo haa jama'aaje yimɓe Allah.

source: Now in this that I declare unto you I praise you not, that ye come together not for the better, but for the worse.
target: Woodi haala feere boo. Ngam daliila maaka mi manataa on. To on ɗon mooɓto, ɗum laatataako ngam hayru mon, ammaa ngam sarru mon.

source: For first of all, when ye come together in the church, I hear that there be divisions among you; and I partly believe it.
target: Aran, mi nani on cenndaama geɓe feere feere nder kawtal mon. Goɗɗum haala ka'a mi tammi ɗum gooŋga.

source: For there must be also heresies among you, that they which are approved may be made manifest among you.
target: Haani cenndol laato caka mooɗon ngam haa yerdaaɓe mbaŋga.

source: When ye come together therefore into one place, this is not to eat the Lord's supper.
target: Yaake mooɓtotooɗon, naa kiirtaari Jawmiraawo nyaamoton.

source: For in eating every one taketh before other his own supper: and one is hungry, and another is drunken.
target: Ngam koo moy mooɗon ɗon yaawana nyaamugo nyaamdu muuɗum. Bana nii goɗɗo feere lutti bee dolo, goɗɗo boo ɗon wuyki.

source: What? have ye not houses to eat and to drink in? or despise ye the church of God, and shame them that have not? What shall I say to you? shall I praise you in this? I praise you not.
target: Kadi, on ngalaa ci'e ngam nyaamugo e yarugo na? Malla on ɗon njawa jama'aare yimɓe Allah? On ngiɗi semtingo ɓe ngalaa koo ɗume na? Ko ngiɗɗon mi wi'a on? Mi mana on na? Aa'a, mi manataa on dow haala ka'a.

source: For I have received of the Lord that which also I delivered unto you, That the Lord Jesus the same night in which he was betrayed took bread:
target: Ndaa ko mi heɓi diga Jawmiraawo, kanjum anndinmi on boo: Jawmiraawo Yeesu, nder jemmaare nde o hokkano haa juuɗe konne'en maako, o hoo'i tamseere,

source: And when he had given thanks, he brake it, and said,  Take, eat: this is my body, which is broken for you: this do in remembrance of me.
target: o yetti Allah ngam maare, o yewi nde, o wi'i: “Ɗo ɗum ɓanndu am, hokkaandu ngam mooɗon. Mbaɗe ɗum ngam haa on ciftorammi.”

source: After the same manner also he took the cup, when he had supped, saying,  This cup is the new testament in my blood: this do ye, as oft as ye drink it, in remembrance of me.
target: Ɓaawo nyaamugo maɓɓe, o hoo'i jardugel boo, o wi'i: “Jardugel nge'el woni alkawal kesal ngal Allah tabitiniri bee ƴiiƴam am. Koo ndey njaroton nder maagel fuu, mbaɗe ɗum ngam haa on ciftorammi .”

source: For as often as ye eat this bread, and drink this cup, ye do shew the Lord's death till he come.
target: Koo ndey nyaamoton tamseere nde'e e njaroton nder jardugel nge'el boo, on ɗon ngaazina kubar maayde Jawmiraawo haa yotto loraaki maako.

source: Wherefore whosoever shall eat this bread, and drink this cup of the Lord, unworthily, shall be guilty of the body and blood of the Lord.
target: Ngam maajum mo nyaami tamseere e mo yari nder jardugel Jawmiraawo bilaa samɗingo ɗum, o waɗi aybe dow ɓanndu e ƴiiƴam Jawmiraawo.

source: But let a man examine himself, and so let him eat of that bread, and drink of that cup.
target: Nden kam, sey koo moy linya hoore mum hiddeko o nyaama tamseere e o yara nder jardugel boo.

source: For he that eateth and drinketh unworthily, eateth and drinketh damnation to himself, not discerning the Lord's body.
target: Ngam to goɗɗo nyaami tamseere, yari nder jardugel bilaa senndindirgo ɓanndu Jawmiraawo bee nyaamduuji goɗɗi, o fooɗani hoore maako kiita.

source: For this cause many are weak and sickly among you, and many sleep.
target: Ngam daliila maajum ɗuuɗɓe caka mooɗon tampi, ɗuuɗɓe boo nyawi e woɗɓe ɗuuɗɓe boo maayi.

source: For if we would judge ourselves, we should not be judged.
target: To en linyi ko'e meeɗen, Allah hiitataako en.

source: But when we are judged, we are chastened of the Lord, that we should not be condemned with the world.
target: Ammaa Jawmiraawo ɗon elta en bee kiita mum, ngam taa o do'a en kiita hawtaade bee duniyaaru.

source: Wherefore, my brethren, when ye come together to eat, tarry one for another.
target: Ngam maajum, deerɗiraaɓe am, to on ɗon mooɓto ngam nyaamugo kiirtaari Jawmiraawo, munye haa to on fuu on kawti.

source: And if any man hunger, let him eat at home; that ye come not together unto condemnation. And the rest will I set in order when I come.
target: To goɗɗo maati dolo, sey o aarta o nyaama diga saare maako, ngam taa pooɗanon ko'e mooɗon kiita Allah nder mooɓtorde mooɗon. Ko laarani haalaaji goɗɗi kam, mi ta'an ɗi to mi yottake haa mooɗon.

source: Now concerning spiritual gifts, brethren, I would not have you ignorant.
target: Ko laarani haala dokke ɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo hokkata, deerɗiraaɓe am, mi yiɗaa on ngona nder kumpa.

source: Ye know that ye were Gentiles, carried away unto these dumb idols, even as ye were led.
target: Yaake on tampa-diina'en, al'aada mooɗon yerɓi on haa labbi muukaaji.

source: Wherefore I give you to understand, that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed: and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord, but by the Holy Ghost.
target: Ngam maajum mi yiɗi on paama ɗu'um: Walaa mo Ruuhu Allah ɗowata ɗum nden wi'a: “Yeesu o naalaaɗo!” Bana non boo mo Ruuhu ɗowaay ɗum waawataa wi'go: “Yeesu woni Jawmiraawo”.

source: Now there are diversities of gifts, but the same Spirit.
target: Woodi dokke feere feereeje, ammaa Ruuhu gooto tan hokkata ɗe fuu.

source: And there are differences of administrations, but the same Lord.
target: Woodi kuuɗe feere feereeje, ammaa Jawmiraawo gooto en kuuwanta.

source: And there are diversities of operations, but it is the same God which worketh all in all.
target: Woodi boo baawɗe feere feereeje ngam huuwugo, ammaa Allah gooto tan waɗata ɗum fuu nder yimɓe fuu.

source: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal.
target: Dokkal Ruuhu Allah ɗon waŋga nder koo moy meeɗen ngam haa ngal nafa jama'aare fuu.

source: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit;
target: Goɗɗo feere Ruuhu ɗon hokka ɗum dokkal wolwugo bee hikma, goɗɗo boo ɗon heɓa diga Ruuhu man dokkal wolwugo bee anndal.

source: To another faith by the same Spirit; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit;
target: Goɗɗo feere Ruuhu man ɗon hokka mo nuɗɗinki cemmbiɗki, goɗɗo boo ɗon heɓa diga Ruuhu man baawal yamɗitingo.

source: To another the working of miracles; to another prophecy; to another discerning of spirits; to another divers kinds of tongues; to another the interpretation of tongues:
target: Ruuhu ɗon hokka oo baawal waɗugo kaayeefiiji, oya boo dokkal waɗugo annabaaku. O ɗon hokka goɗɗo feere dokkal senndindirgo hakkunde ko iwata diga Ruuhu Allah bee ko iwata diga ruuhuuji goɗɗi. O ɗon hokka oo dokkal wolwugo bee ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka, oya boo dokkal fassitirgo ɗe.

source: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will.
target: Ammaa ɗum fuu, Ruuhu gooto tan waɗata ɗum feere mum. O ɗon yeɗa koo moy baawal mum fodde muuyo maako .

source: For as the body is one, and hath many members, and all the members of that one body, being many, are one body: so also is Christ.
target: Ɓanndu wooru mari terɗe feere feereeje ɗuuɗɗe. Terɗe ɗe'e fuu ɗon kawti haa ɓanndu wooru man. Non Almasiihu laatori boo .

source: For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body, whether we be Jews or Gentiles, whether we be bond or free; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit.
target: Ngam enen fuu, koo Yahuudu'en, koo iwɓe haa ummaatooje goɗɗe, koo maccuɓe, koo rimɓe, en keɓi baptisma nder Ruuhu gooto ngam hawtango ɓanndu wooru. En fuu en laati yarnaaɓe Ruuhu gooto oo.

source: For the body is not one member, but many.
target: Ɓanndu kam maraay tergal gootal tan, ammaa terɗe ɗuuɗɗe.

source: If the foot shall say, Because I am not the hand, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?
target: To kosŋgal wi'anno: “Mi laataaki juŋngo, ngam man mi hawtanaay ɓanndu.” Bee non fuu ɗum haɗataa ngal laataago tergal haa ɓanndu.

source: And if the ear shall say, Because I am not the eye, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?
target: Malla nofru to wi'anno: “Naa mi yiitere, ngam maajum mi hawtanaay ɓanndu.” Fakat, ɗum haɗataa ndu laataago tergal haa ɓanndu.

source: If the whole body were an eye, where were the hearing? If the whole were hearing, where were the smelling?
target: To ɓanndu fuu laatakeno yiitere, noy ndu nanirta? To ndu laatake nofru tan, noy ndu luuɓnirta?

source: But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body, as it hath pleased him.
target: Fakat, Allah waɗi tergal koo ngale haa ɓanndu fodde muuyo mum.

source: And if they were all one member, where were the body?
target: To terɗe fuu laatakeno tergal gootal, nden kam naa ɗum ɓanndu fahin.

source: But now are they many members, yet but one body.
target: Ngam maajum kadi woodi terɗe ɗuuɗɗe, ammaa ɓanndu kam wooru tan.

source: And the eye cannot say unto the hand, I have no need of thee: nor again the head to the feet, I have no need of you.
target: Yiitere fotaay wi'go juŋngo: “Mi walaa haaje ma.” Hoore boo fotaay wi'go kosɗe: “Mi walaa haaje mon.”

source: Nay, much more those members of the body, which seem to be more feeble, are necessary:
target: Ko ɓuri non fahin, terɗe ɓanndu ɗe ndaareten bana tampuɗe, kanje ɓuri nafuuda.

source: And those members of the body, which we think to be less honourable, upon these we bestow more abundant honour; and our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness.
target: Terɗe ɗe saman maaje ɗuuɗaay, kanje ɓurɗen hakkilango. Terɗe ɗe cemtirten, kanje ɓurɗen suklanaago masin.

source: For our comely parts have no need: but God hath tempered the body together, having given more abundant honour to that part which lacked:
target: Terɗe ɓuranɗe fottango en, ngalaa haaje suklaneego. Allah waɗi ɓanndu haa ko woni leesɗum haa maaru fuu heɓa samɗineego ko ɓura.

source: That there should be no schism in the body; but that the members should have the same care one for another.
target: Nden kadi walaa cenndol hakkunde terɗe haa ɓanndu, ammaa sey terɗe fuu njiŋngindira hakkunde muuɗum'en.

source: And whether one member suffer, all the members suffer with it; or one member be honoured, all the members rejoice with it.
target: To tergal gootal ɗon naawa, terɗe fuu maatan naawreeŋga bee maagal. To gootal teddinaama, goɗɗe fuu ceyodoto bee maagal boo.

source: Now ye are the body of Christ, and members in particular.
target: On fuu on laati ɓanndu Almasiihu, koo moy mooɗon laati tergal haa maaru.

source: And God hath set some in the church, first apostles, secondarily prophets, thirdly teachers, after that miracles, then gifts of healings, helps, governments, diversities of tongues.
target: Allah hokki koo moy joonde mum nder jama'aare: Aran nelaaɓe, ɗiɗawre annabi'en e tataɓre boo ekkitinooɓe. Ɓaawo maajum boo waɗooɓe kaayeefiiji e waawɓe yamɗitingo e wallooɓe e ɗowooɓe e wolwooɓe bee ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka .

source: Are all apostles? are all prophets? are all teachers? are all workers of miracles?
target: Ɓe fuu ɓe nelaaɓe na? Ɓe fuu ɓe annabi'en na? Ɓe fuu ɓe ekkitinooɓe na? Ɓe fuu ɓe waɗooɓe kaayeefiiji na?

source: Have all the gifts of healing? do all speak with tongues? do all interpret?
target: Ɓe fuu ɓe yamɗitinooɓe na? Ɓe fuu ɓe wolwooɓe bee ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka na? Ɓe fuu ɓe fassitirooɓe ɗemɗe na? Aa'a!

source: But covet earnestly the best gifts: and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way.
target: Ngele dokke ɓuranɗe saman. Jonta mi sappinan on ko ɓurata dokke ɗe'e fuu wooɗugo.

source: Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels, and have not charity, I am become as sounding brass, or a tinkling cymbal.
target: To mi anndi wolwugo ɗemɗe yimɓe e ɗe malaa'ika'en, ammaa to mi walaa yiide, nden kam mi laati bana njamndi iidoori malla koŋsiire hoolo.

source: And though I have the gift of prophecy, and understand all mysteries, and all knowledge; and though I have all faith, so that I could remove mountains, and have not charity, I am nothing.
target: To mi woodi dokkal waɗugo annabaaku malla to mi faami sirriiji Allah fuu, to mi anndi koo ɗume fuu, to mi woodi nuɗɗinki haa mi waawi sottingo kooseeje boo, ammaa to mi walaa yiide, nden kam mi huunde meere .

source: And though I bestow all my goods to feed the poor, and though I give my body to be burned, and have not charity, it profiteth me nothing.
target: Koo to mi senndani talaka'en jawdi am fuu, to mi jaɓi ɓanndu am wule boo, ammaa to mi walaa yiide, koo ko ɗum nafatammi.

source: Charity suffereth long, and is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up,
target: Marɗo yiide munyanan woɗɓe, o woonanan ɓe. O haajataa, o jurataako, o mawnitittaako.

source: Doth not behave itself unseemly, seeketh not her own, is not easily provoked, thinketh no evil;
target: Marɗo yiide waɗataa cemtiniiɗum, o suklantaako ko nafata hoore maako tan, o tikkataa law, o siftortaa aybeeji ɗi goɗɗo waɗani mo.

source: Rejoiceth not in iniquity, but rejoiceth in the truth;
target: O seyortaako sooynde adilaaku, ammaa o seyorto gooŋga.

source: Beareth all things, believeth all things, hopeth all things, endureth all things.
target: Marɗo yiide munyanan koo ɗume fuu. Nuɗɗinki maako e tammunde maako e munyal maako tampataa nder koo ɗume fuu.

source: Charity never faileth: but whether there be prophecies, they shall fail; whether there be tongues, they shall cease; whether there be knowledge, it shall vanish away.
target: Yiide duumoto haa foroy. Bolle annabaaku njinnan, wolwugo bee ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka timman, anndal boo majjan.

source: For we know in part, and we prophesy in part.
target: Ngam anndal men e annabaaku men mbaŋgintaa gooŋga fuu, sey goɗɗum maaka.

source: But when that which is perfect is come, then that which is in part shall be done away.
target: Ammaa geɓe man majjan to gooŋga fuu waŋgi.

source: When I was a child, I spake as a child, I understood as a child, I thought as a child: but when I became a man, I put away childish things.
target: Yaake mi ɓiŋngelno, mi ɗonno wolwa bana ɓiŋngel, mi ɗonno numa bana ɓiŋngel, mi hiisti bana ɓiŋngel boo. Jonta nde mi mawni, mi acci gikku nderkaaku.

source: For now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face: now I know in part; but then shall I know even as also I am known.
target: Haa ngonɗen jonta ɗo, en ngi'ataa kuuje laaɓɗum, en ɗon ngi'a ɗe bana nder daarorgal . Ammaa saa'i waran haa en ngi'a Jawmiraawo gite bee gite. Jonta mi anndi mo dow dow, ammaa saa'i man mi anndan mo laaɓɗum tal bana no kaŋko boo o anndiri yam.

source: And now abideth faith, hope, charity, these three; but the greatest of these is charity.
target: Jonta kam, ndaa kuuje tati ɗon: nuɗɗinki e tammunde e yiide. Ammaa ko ɓuri mawnugo ɗum yiide.

source: Follow after charity, and desire spiritual gifts, but rather that ye may prophesy.
target: Tiine heɓugo yiide. Ngele boo dokke Ruuhu, sakkomaa baawal waɗugo annabaaku.

source: For he that speaketh in an unknown tongue speaketh not unto men, but unto God: for no man understandeth him; howbeit in the spirit he speaketh mysteries.
target: Bolwanɗo bee ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka wolwantaa yimɓe, o ɗon wolwana Allah. Walaa paamanɗo mo. Bee baawɗe Ruuhu Allah o ɗon wolwa kuuje sirriije.

source: But he that prophesieth speaketh unto men to edification, and exhortation, and comfort.
target: Ammaa gaazotooɗo kubaruuji Allah ɗon wolwana yimɓe ngam semmbiɗingo ɓe, ngam suusɗingo ɓe, ngam de'itingo ɓe.

source: He that speaketh in an unknown tongue edifieth himself; but he that prophesieth edifieth the church.
target: Bolwanɗo bee ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka ɗon semmbiɗina hoore mum tan. Ammaa baɗanɗo annabaaku ɗon semmbiɗina jama'aare fuu.

source: I would that ye all spake with tongues, but rather that ye prophesied: for greater is he that prophesieth than he that speaketh with tongues, except he interpret, that the church may receive edifying.
target: Mi yiɗi on fuu on keɓa wolwugo bee ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka, ammaa mi ɓuran yiɗugo on keɓa waɗugo annabaaku. Baɗanɗo annabaaku ɓuri nafugo dow mo ɗon wolwa ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka, sonaa teema to woodi goɗɗo ngam fassitirgo ɗe haa jama'aare fuu semmbiɗine.

source: Now, brethren, if I come unto you speaking with tongues, what shall I profit you, except I shall speak to you either by revelation, or by knowledge, or by prophesying, or by doctrine?
target: Deerɗiraaɓe am, teema mi wari haa mooɗon, mi wolwani on bee ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka. Nafuuda kaye mi waddanta on? Walaa sam! Sonaa to mi waŋginani on sirriijum goɗɗum malla to mi waddani on anndal malla to mi waɗi annabaaku malla boo to mi ekkitini on.

source: And even things without life giving sound, whether pipe or harp, except they give a distinction in the sounds, how shall it be known what is piped or harped?
target: Ɗum nanndi bee haala kuuje gimruɗe, bana ciidal malla moolooru. To sawtu man waɗaay feere feere, noy anndirten ko ciidal fijata bee ko moolooru fijata?

source: For if the trumpet give an uncertain sound, who shall prepare himself to the battle?
target: To luwal konu fuufaaka bee laaɓɗum, moy taaskanto haɓre?

source: So likewise ye, except ye utter by the tongue words easy to be understood, how shall it be known what is spoken? for ye shall speak into the air.
target: Bana non haa mooɗon boo: To on mbolwi bee ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka, noy goɗɗo faamata ko mbi'oton? Nden kam on mbolwi meere!

source: There are, it may be, so many kinds of voices in the world, and none of them is without signification.
target: Woodi ɗemɗe ɗuuɗɗe feere feereeje nder duniyaaru, ammaa walaa ɗemŋgal ngal ŋakkiri maana.

source: Therefore if I know not the meaning of the voice, I shall be unto him that speaketh a barbarian, and he that speaketh shall be a barbarian unto me.
target: To mi anndaa ɗemŋgal ngal goɗɗo ɗon wolwanammi, goɗɗo oo laatanto yam jananno, min boo mi jananno haa maako.

source: Even so ye, forasmuch as ye are zealous of spiritual gifts, seek that ye may excel to the edifying of the church.
target: Onon boo nde nii on ngiɗi dokke Ruuhu masin, tiine heɓugo ɗe. Ammaa ɗum laato ngam semmbiɗingo jama'aare.

source: Wherefore let him that speaketh in an unknown tongue pray that he may interpret.
target: Ngam maajum bolwanɗo bee ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka, sey o toro Allah haa o waawa fassitirgo ɗe boo.

source: For if I pray in an unknown tongue, my spirit prayeth, but my understanding is unfruitful.
target: Ngam to mi ɗon waɗa do'a bee ɗemŋgal ngal anndaaka, ruuhu am boo ɗon waɗa do'a, ammaa hakkiilo am huuwataa.

source: What is it then? I will pray with the spirit, and I will pray with the understanding also: I will sing with the spirit, and I will sing with the understanding also.
target: To non kam, ko mbaɗanmi? Mi waɗan do'a bee ruuhu am, non boo mi waɗan do'a bee hakkiilo am boo. Mi yiman maŋgtoore bee ruuhu am, non boo mi yiman bee hakkiilo am.

source: Else when thou shalt bless with the spirit, how shall he that occupieth the room of the unlearned say Amen at thy giving of thanks, seeing he understandeth not what thou sayest?
target: To a ɗon yetta Allah bee ruuhu ma tan, noy goɗɗo nder mooɓtorde mo faamaay haala man wi'rata “Aamiina” haa do'a maaɗa? Ngam o faamataa ko mbi'ata.

source: For thou verily givest thanks well, but the other is not edified.
target: Koo to do'a maaɗa wooɗi masin, ɗum semmbiɗintaa oya sam.

source: I thank my God, I speak with tongues more than ye all:
target: Mi ɗon yetta Allah ngam mi ɓuri on fuu wolwugo bee ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka.

source: Yet in the church I had rather speak five words with my understanding, that by my voice I might teach others also, than ten thousand words in an unknown tongue.
target: Ammaa nder mooɓtorde nuɗɗinɓe mi ɓuran yiɗugo mi wolwa bolle jowi paameteeɗe ngam ekkitingo woɗɓe, dow bolle ujine sappo bee ɗemŋgal ngal anndaaka.

source: Brethren, be not children in understanding: howbeit in malice be ye children, but in understanding be men.
target: Deerɗiraaɓe am, taa nume bana ɓikkoy. Nder halleende, laate on laaɓɓe bana ɓikkoy. Ammaa nder numooji mooɗon laate on mawɓe.

source: In the law it is written, With men of other tongues and other lips will I speak unto this people; and yet for all that will they not hear me, saith the Lord.
target: Ndaa ko winnda nder Tawreeta: “Mi wolwanan ummaatoore nde'e bee yimɓe wolwanɓe bolle ɗe anndaaka, bee kunnduɗe jananɓe. Koo non fuu ɓe nanantaa yam .”

source: Wherefore tongues are for a sign, not to them that believe, but to them that believe not: but prophesying serveth not for them that believe not, but for them which believe.
target: Ngam maajum wolwugo bee ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka laati alaama ngam sooyɓe nuɗɗinki, naa ngam nuɗɗinɓe. Ammaa waɗgo annabaaku laati alaama ngam nuɗɗinɓe, naa ngam sooyɓe nuɗɗinki.

source: If therefore the whole church be come together into one place, and all speak with tongues, and there come in those that are unlearned, or unbelievers, will they not say that ye are mad?
target: Bana to jama'aare mooɗon fuu mooɓtake e koo moy mooɗon boo fuɗɗi wolwugo bee ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka. Nden yimɓe ɓe anndaa haala man malla heefeerɓe ngari, nasti. Ɓe mbi'ataa on yinnaaɓe na?

source: But if all prophesy, and there come in one that believeth not, or one unlearned, he is convinced of all, he is judged of all:
target: Ammaa to koo moy ɗon waɗa annabaaku, cooyɗo nuɗɗinki malla goɗɗo mo anndaa haala man boo nasti, bolle ɗe o nanata fuu paamtinan mo aybeeji maako e ɗe kiitoto mo,

source: And thus are the secrets of his heart made manifest; and so falling down on his face he will worship God, and report that God is in you of a truth.
target: ɗe mbaŋginan numooji ɓernde maako. Nden o sujidanan Allah, o seedoto: “Fakat, Allah ɗon caka mooɗon!”

source: How is it then, brethren? when ye come together, every one of you hath a psalm, hath a doctrine, hath a tongue, hath a revelation, hath an interpretation. Let all things be done unto edifying.
target: Deerɗiraaɓe am, to non kam, noy mbaɗoton? Yaake mooɓtotooɗon fuu, goɗɗo maran yimre, oya maran ekkitinol, goɗɗo boo wahayu, goɗɗo feere boo wolwan bee ɗemŋgal ngal anndaaka, goɗɗo feere fahin fassitiran ngal. Sey ɗum fuu ɗum laato ngam semmbiɗingo jama'aare.

source: If any man speak in an unknown tongue, let it be by two, or at the most by three, and that by course; and let one interpret.
target: To ɗum haala wolwugo bee ɗemŋgal ngal anndaaka kam, acce yimɓe ɗiɗo mbolwa, taa ɓura tato. Sey ɓe mbolwa bee tokkindirki. Sey goɗɗo boo fassitira ko ɓe mbi'ata.

source: But if there be no interpreter, let him keep silence in the church; and let him speak to himself, and to God.
target: Ammaa to passitiroowo woodaa, sey wolwanɓe bee ɗemɗe go njeeɗo nder mooɓtorde. Koo moy maɓɓe wolwana hoore muuɗum e o wolwana Allah.

source: Let the prophets speak two or three, and let the other judge.
target: Sey waɗooɓe annabaaku ɗiɗo malla tato mbolwa, luttuɓe boo linya ko ɓe mbi'ata.

source: If any thing be revealed to another that sitteth by, let the first hold his peace.
target: Ammaa to goɗɗo feere heɓi wahayu, sey bolwanɗo saa'i maajum jeeɗo.

source: For ye may all prophesy one by one, that all may learn, and all may be comforted.
target: On fuu on mbaawan waɗugo annabaaku, ammaa sey ɗum laato bee tokkindirki, ngam haa yimɓe fuu paama, ɓe keɓa cuusɗinki.

source: And the spirits of the prophets are subject to the prophets.
target: Ngam ruuhu annabi'en ɗon ɗowtano annabi'en.

source: For God is not the author of confusion, but of peace, as in all churches of the saints.
target: Ngam Allah naa o Allah njiiɓru, ammaa o Allah salaaman. Bana ko ɗon laato nder jama'aaje nuɗɗinɓe fuu,

source: Let your women keep silence in the churches: for it is not permitted unto them to speak; but they are commanded to be under obedience, as also saith the law.
target: sey rewɓe njeeɗo nder mooɓtorde. Ɓe nduŋanaaka wolwugo. Sey ɓe cirwo, ɓe laato ɗowtiiɓe bana ko tawreeta umri.

source: And if they will learn any thing, let them ask their husbands at home: for it is a shame for women to speak in the church.
target: To woodi ko ɓe ngiɗi faamugo, sey ɓe ƴama worɓe maɓɓe haa saare. Ngam ɗum cemtuɗum haa debbo wolwa nder mooɓtorde.

source: What? came the word of God out from you? or came it unto you only?
target: Malla haa mooɗon wolde Allah iwi? Malla haa mooɗon tan nde yotti?

source: If any man think himself to be a prophet, or spiritual, let him acknowledge that the things that I write unto you are the commandments of the Lord.
target: To goɗɗo numi o annabiijo malla o keɓɗo wahayuuji Ruuhu, nden kam sey o anndita ko mi winndani on ɗum umroore Jawmiraawo.

source: But if any man be ignorant, let him be ignorant.
target: Ammaa to o annditaay ɗum, Allah boo anndaa mo.

source: Wherefore, brethren, covet to prophesy, and forbid not to speak with tongues.
target: Ngam maajum deerɗiraaɓe am, ngele waɗugo annabaaku. Ammaa taa kaɗe boo wolwugo bee ɗemɗe ɗe anndaaka.

source: Let all things be done decently and in order.
target: Sey koo ɗume waɗe bee laawol man, bana no haandi.

source: Moreover, brethren, I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you, which also ye have received, and wherein ye stand;
target: Deerɗiraaɓe am, mi yeli siftinorgo on Linjiila ka ngaazumi on, ka njaɓɗon, ka tabititɗon nder muuɗum.

source: By which also ye are saved, if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you, unless ye have believed in vain.
target: Linjiila ka'a hisnan on to on njogitake ka bana ngaazirmi on ka. To naa non nuɗɗinki mooɗon laati meere.

source: For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received, how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures;
target: Mi anndini on kubaruwol ɓurŋgol marugo saman, ngol njaɓmi bee hoore am, waato: Almasiihu maayi ngam daliila hakkeeji meeɗen, bana ko winnda nder defte .

source: And that he was buried, and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures:
target: Ɓe uwi mo. O ummiti diga maayde nyalaade tataɓre, bana ko winnda nder defte .

source: And that he was seen of Cephas, then of the twelve:
target: O waŋgani Piyer, nden pukara'en sappo e ɗiɗo .

source: After that, he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once; of whom the greater part remain unto this present, but some are fallen asleep.
target: Ɓaawoɗon o waŋgani deerɗiraaɓe ko ɓuri teemeɗɗe njowo hawtuɓe haa nokkuure woore. Ɓurna maɓɓe ɗon haa jonta, ammaa woɗɓe maayi.

source: After that, he was seen of James; then of all the apostles.
target: Ɓaawo maajum o waŋgani Yaakuba, nden nelaaɓe fuu.

source: And last of all he was seen of me also, as of one born out of due time.
target: Haa ragare man, ɓaawo maɓɓe fuu, o waŋgani yam min boo, min laatiiɗo bana ɓiŋngel danyaaŋgel ngel lebbi mum cikaay ,

source: For I am the least of the apostles, that am not meet to be called an apostle, because I persecuted the church of God.
target: ngam mi ɓurdi nelaaɓe fuu leesugo, mi he'aay maa wi'eego nelaaɗo, ngam mi toonyino jama'aare yimɓe Allah .

source: But by the grace of God I am what I am: and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain; but I laboured more abundantly than they all: yet not I, but the grace of God which was with me.
target: Ammaa ngam mo'ere Allah laatiimi nelaaɗo bana no mi wa'i hannde e mo'ere maako nde o waɗani yam laataaki meere. Mi huuwi ko ɓuri nelaaɓe fuu. Naa min bee hoore am huuwi ɗum, ammaa mo'ere Allah huuwi nder am.

source: Therefore whether it were I or they, so we preach, and so ye believed.
target: Koo min, koo kamɓe, ndaa Linjiila ka min ngaazi on, ndaa ko nuɗɗinɗon.

source: Now if Christ be preached that he rose from the dead, how say some among you that there is no resurrection of the dead?
target: Min ɗon ngaazina Almasiihu ummitake diga maayde. Noy woɗɓe mooɗon mbi'rata maayɓe ummitittaako?

source: But if there be no resurrection of the dead, then is Christ not risen:
target: To ummitineeki maayɓe woodaa, nden kam Almasiihu boo ummitaaki.

source: And if Christ be not risen, then is our preaching vain, and your faith is also vain.
target: To Almasiihu ummitaaki boo, nden kam waazu amin laatake meere, nuɗɗinki mooɗon boo laati meere.

source: Yea, and we are found false witnesses of God; because we have testified of God that he raised up Christ: whom he raised not up, if so be that the dead rise not.
target: To fakat maayɓe ummitittaako, nden kam ɗum yiɗi wi'go Allah boo ummitinaay Almasiihu diga maayde. To non kam min laati seedanooɓe Allah fewooɓe, ngam min ceedi o ummitini Almasiihu diga maayde.

source: For if the dead rise not, then is not Christ raised:
target: To maayɓe ummitittaako, nden kam Almasiihu boo ummitaaki.

source: And if Christ be not raised, your faith is vain; ye are yet in your sins.
target: To Almasiihu ummitaaki, nuɗɗinki mooɗon nafataa, nden boo on ɗon nder hakkeeji mooɗon haa jonta.

source: Then they also which are fallen asleep in Christ are perished.
target: Non boo nuɗɗinɓe Almasiihu maayɓe boo kalki.

source: If in this life only we have hope in Christ, we are of all men most miserable.
target: To nii en tammorake Almasiihu ngam ngeendam jontaajam tan, nden kam en ɓurdan yimɓe fuu yurmaago.

source: But now is Christ risen from the dead, and become the firstfruits of them that slept.
target: Ammaa, fakat kam, Almasiihu ummitake diga maayde. Kaŋko woni aartuɗo ummitaago caka maayɓe fuu ngam haa woɗɓe boo ummito.

source: For since by man came death, by man came also the resurrection of the dead.
target: Bana no maayde wardi daliila neɗɗo gooto, bana non ummitineeki maayɓe boo wardi bee neɗɗo gooto.

source: For as in Adam all die, even so in Christ shall all be made alive.
target: Bana no yimɓe fuu maayrata ngam daliila kawtal muuɗum'en bee Aadamu, bana non ɓe ummititto ngam kawtal maɓɓe bee Almasiihu.

source: But every man in his own order: Christ the firstfruits; afterward they that are Christ's at his coming.
target: Ammaa koo moy dow tokkindirki mum: Almasiihu woni aartuɗo, ɓaawoɗon tokkiiɓe mo ummititto to o lorake.

source: Then cometh the end, when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God, even the Father; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power.
target: Nden timmoode waran. Yaake man Almasiihu halkan mawɓe asama e marɓe laamu e marɓe baawɗe fuu, nden o hokkitan laamu haa juŋngo Allah Baabiraawo.

source: For he must reign, till he hath put all enemies under his feet.
target: Ngam doole Almasiihu laamo haa to o wallini konne'en maako fuu les kosɗe maako .

source: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death.
target: Konneejo ragareejo kalketeeɗo, ɗum waade.

source: For he hath put all things under his feet. But when he saith all things are put under him, it is manifest that he is excepted which did put all things under him.
target: Ngam deftere wi'i: “Allah wallini koo ɗume fuu les kosɗe maako.” To Almasiihu wi'i: “Koo ɗume fuu wallinaama les kosɗe mum”, ɗum yiɗi wi'go Allah ballinɗo kuuje fuu les maako limaaka .

source: And when all things shall be subdued unto him, then shall the Son also himself be subject unto him that put all things under him, that God may be all in all.
target: To yottake haa kuuje fuu mballinaama les Ɓiɗɗo, nden Ɓiɗɗo sappanan Allah, baɗɗo mo Jawmiraawo dow koo ɗume fuu, ngam haa Allah laamo koo toy fuu e nder koo ɗume fuu.

source: Else what shall they do which are baptized for the dead, if the dead rise not at all? why are they then baptized for the dead?
target: To gooŋga maayɓe ummitittaako, nafuuda kaye yimɓe jaɓanɓe baptisma mbattudi maayɓe tammoto waɗugo?

source: And why stand we in jeopardy every hour?
target: Koo minin boo, ngam ɗume min ɗon tum yeeso joote?

source: I protest by your rejoicing which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord, I die daily.
target: Deerɗam'en, fakat bana mi mantorto on yeeso Jawmiraawo men Yeesu Almasiihu, nyalɗe fuu mi ɗon nder joote maayde.

source: If after the manner of men I have fought with beasts at Ephesus, what advantageth it me, if the dead rise not? let us eat and drink; for to morrow we die.
target: To mi waɗi haɓre saatunde haa Efesus bee dabbaaji kalluɗi bana yimɓe fuu mbaɗata, ɗume ɗum nafi yam? To maayɓe ummitittaako kam, ndikka en tokko koŋngol mbi'anŋgol: “Nyaamen, njaren, ngam jaŋngo en maayan .”

source: Be not deceived: evil communications corrupt good manners.
target: Taa este ko'e mooɗon! “Tokkotirgo bee kalluɗo wonnan gikku mbooɗŋgu.”

source: Awake to righteousness, and sin not; for some have not the knowledge of God: I speak this to your shame.
target: Njo'itine hakkiilo mooɗon bana no haani, taa mbaɗe hakke. Ngam woɗɓe mooɗon anndaa Allah. Mi wi'i ɗum ngam haa on cemta.

source: But some man will say, How are the dead raised up? and with what body do they come?
target: Teema goɗɗo ƴaman: “Bana noy maayɓe ummitorto? Irin ɓanndu nduye ɓe marata?”

source: Thou fool, that which thou sowest is not quickened, except it die:
target: Kayya! An paataaɗo! To a aawi aawdi, ndi fuɗataa sonaa to ndi waati.

source: And that which thou sowest, thou sowest not that body that shall be, but bare grain, it may chance of wheat, or of some other grain:
target: Ko aawata ɗum gawel meere. Ɗum gawel alkamaari malla koo ngele, naa ɗum fuɗŋgo marŋgo haakooji.

source: But God giveth it a body as it hath pleased him, and to every seed his own body.
target: Ɓaawoɗon Allah ɗon hokka gawel fuu irin ɓanndu maagel bana o muuyi. Aawdi koo ndiye laatoto fuɗŋgo fodde no ndi wa'i.

source: All flesh is not the same flesh: but there is one kind of flesh of men, another flesh of beasts, another of fishes, and another of birds.
target: Ɓalli kuuje geete fuu nanndaay. Ɓalli yimɓe cenndiri bee ɓalli dabbaaji, ɓalli colli cenndiri bee ɓalli liɗɗi.

source: There are also celestial bodies, and bodies terrestrial: but the glory of the celestial is one, and the glory of the terrestrial is another.
target: Non woodi boo kuuje asamaaje e kuuje lesdiije. Tedduŋgal kuuje asamaaje nanndaay bee tedduŋgal kuuje lesdiije.

source: There is one glory of the sun, and another glory of the moon, and another glory of the stars: for one star differeth from another star in glory.
target: Naaŋge woodi ɗelko mum, lewru woodi ɗelko feere, koode boo ngoodi ɗelko feere. Koo caka koode boo, ɗelko horre ɗon feerotira bee ɗelko horre woɗnde.

source: So also is the resurrection of the dead. It is sown in corruption; it is raised in incorruption:
target: Bana non ɗum laatorto boo saa'i ummitineeki maayɓe. Ɓanndu uwaandu nyolan. Ammaa to ndu ummitake, ndu nyolataa.

source: It is sown in dishonour; it is raised in glory: it is sown in weakness; it is raised in power:
target: Ɓanndu uwaandu, ndu tampundu, ndu nyiddundu. Ammaa yaake ndu ummititto, ndu marndu tedduŋgal, semmbiɗndu.

source: It is sown a natural body; it is raised a spiritual body. There is a natural body, and there is a spiritual body.
target: Ɓanndu uwaandu bana gawel, ɗum ɓanndu ndu neɗɗo. Ammaa yaake ndu ummititto, Ruuhu ɗon yeeɗitina ndu. Ngam maajum woodi ɓanndu ndu kusel, non boo woodi ɓanndu ndu Ruuhu.

source: And so it is written, The first man Adam was made a living soul; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit.
target: Bana non deftere wi'i: “Aadamu, neɗɗo arano laati goɗɗo geeto.” Ammaa Aadamu ragareejo, waato Almasiihu, laati Ruuhu dokkoowo ngeendam .

source: Howbeit that was not first which is spiritual, but that which is natural; and afterward that which is spiritual.
target: Naa mo Ruuhu aartata, ammaa mo neɗɗo, ɓaawoɗon mo Ruuhu.

source: The first man is of the earth, earthy: the second man is the Lord from heaven.
target: Arano tagraama bee mbulwuldi lesdi. Ammaa ɗiɗaɓo iwi haa asama.

source: As is the earthy, such are they also that are earthy: and as is the heavenly, such are they also that are heavenly.
target: Yimɓe ɓe lesdi nanndi bee tagraaɗo mbulwuldi. Yimɓe ɓe asama boo nanndi bee iwɗo haa asama.

source: And as we have borne the image of the earthy, we shall also bear the image of the heavenly.
target: Bana no nanndirɗen bee mbulwuldiijo, non boo en nanndan bee iwɗo haa asama.

source: Now this I say, brethren, that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God; neither doth corruption inherit incorruption.
target: Deerɗiraaɓe am, ndaa ko ngiɗmi faamtingo on: Marɗo kusel e ƴiiƴam nastataa laamu Allah. Ko nyolata boo ronataa ko duumoto.

source: Behold, I shew you a mystery; We shall not all sleep, but we shall all be changed,
target: Haa mi waŋginana on sirriijum feere: Naa en fuu en maayan, ammaa en fuu en ngaylititto.

source: In a moment, in the twinkling of an eye, at the last trump: for the trumpet shall sound, and the dead shall be raised incorruptible, and we shall be changed.
target: Ɗum waɗoto law, bana ma'annde yiitere, saa'i fuufannde luwal ragareere. Luwal fuufete. Nden maayɓe ummititto ngam ngeendam nduumiiɗam. Enen, en ngaylititto .

source: For this corruptible must put on incorruption, and this mortal must put on immortality.
target: Non kadi ɓalli meeɗen nyolanɗi ɓornoto ko duumoto, maayanɗi boo ɓornoto ko maayataa.

source: So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption, and this mortal shall have put on immortality, then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written, Death is swallowed up in victory.
target: To ɓanndu nyolanndu ɓornake ko nyolataa, to maayanndu ɓornake ko maayataa, nden kam wolde annabaaku nde'e gooŋɗan: “Waade nattinaama nder jaalorgal timmidiiŋgal .

source: O death, where is thy sting? O grave, where is thy victory?
target: An waade, toy jaalorgal ma? An waade, toy baawɗe ma ngam mbarugo ?”

source: The sting of death is sin; and the strength of sin is the law.
target: Waade ɗon heɓa baawɗe muuɗum ngam mbarugo diga hakke, hakke boo ɗon heɓa baawɗe muuɗum diga tawreeta.

source: But thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
target: Ammaa yettoore laatano Allah, dokkanɗo en jaalorgal bee Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiihu!

source: Therefore, my beloved brethren, be ye stedfast, unmoveable, always abounding in the work of the Lord, forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord.
target: Ngam maajum, onon deerɗiraaɓe am yiɗaaɓe, laate on tabititɓe ɓe ndimmbataako. Tiine foroy nder kuugal Jawmiraawo, ngam on anndi torra mooɗon ngam Jawmiraawo laatataako meere.

source: Now concerning the collection for the saints, as I have given order to the churches of Galatia, even so do ye.
target: Ko laarani ceede mooɓteteeɗe ngam wallugo senaaɓe haa Urusaliima, mbaɗe onon boo bana no umrumi jama'aaje nuɗɗinɓe nder Galaatiya .

source: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store, as God hath prospered him, that there be no gatherings when I come.
target: Nyalaade Alat fuu sey koo moy mooɗon resa ceede seɗɗa haa muuɗum baakin no o waawi. Taa ndeene nii haa to mi wari nden puɗɗon mooɓtugo dokke maajum.

source: And when I come, whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters, them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem.
target: To mi yottake, mi nelan suɓaaɓe mooɗon bee bataakeeji haa Urusaliima, haa ɓe njahra dokkal mooɗon ton.

source: And if it be meet that I go also, they shall go with me.
target: To kaanduɗum min boo mi yaha, nden kam ɓe njahdan bee am.

source: Now I will come unto you, when I shall pass through Macedonia: for I do pass through Macedonia.
target: Mi tammi wargo haa mooɗon, mi tokkorto Makedoniya, ngam mi saaloto ton .

source: And it may be that I will abide, yea, and winter with you, that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go.
target: Mi faɓɓan haa mooɗon, teema to heɓoto maa mi saalina wakkati jaaŋgol haa mooɗon. Nden on mballatam nder haaje jahaaŋgal am koo toy ngiɗmi yahugo.

source: For I will not see you now by the way; but I trust to tarry a while with you, if the Lord permit.
target: Mi yiɗaa mi yaala tan mi saalo, to mi wari laarugo on. Mi yiɗi faɓɓugo haa mooɗon seɗɗa, to Jawmiraawo duŋanake yam.

source: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost.
target: Ammaa mi jooɗoto haa Efesus haa yotto juulde  Pantekosta.

source: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me, and there are many adversaries.
target: Ngam mi heɓi laawol huuwugo kuugal maŋngal nafoowal haa ɗo, koo nde konne'en ɗuuɗani yam boo .

source: Now if Timothy come, see that he may be with you without fear: for he worketh the work of the Lord, as I also do.
target: To Timote wari haa mooɗon, njaɓɓe mo booɗɗum haa o jooɗo caka mooɗon bilaa kulol. Ngam kaŋko boo o ɗon huuwana Jawmiraawo bana am .

source: Let no man therefore despise him: but conduct him forth in peace, that he may come unto me: for I look for him with the brethren.
target: Taa goɗɗo yawo mo. Mballe mo haa o timmina jahaaŋgal maako bee jam, ngam haa o warta haa am. Min e deerɗiraaɓe, min ɗon ndeeni mo.

source: As touching our brother Apollos, I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren: but his will was not at all to come at this time; but he will come when he shall have convenient time.
target: Ngam deerɗiraawo meeɗen Apollos kam, mi tiɗɗini mo ɗuuɗɗum haa o yaha haa mooɗon bee deerɗiraaɓe woɗɓe. Ammaa o sali yahugo jonta. O yahan to o heɓi laawol.

source: Watch ye, stand fast in the faith, quit you like men, be strong.
target: Ayne! Tabite nder nuɗɗinki! Tiɗɗine ɓerɗe mooɗon! Laate on semmbiɗɓe!

source: Let all your things be done with charity.
target: Mbaɗe koo ɗume fuu bee yiide.

source: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus: for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied.
target: Mi ɗon seyoro garki Estefanas e Fortunatus e Aka'ikus. Ɓe ndokki yam ko ŋakkani yam nde on daayiiɓe.

source: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours: therefore acknowledge ye them that are such.
target: Ɓe nde'itini yam bana ɓe nde'itinno on boo. Camɗine irin maɓɓe.

source: The churches of Asia salute you. Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord, with the church that is in their house.
target: Jama'aaje nuɗɗinɓe nder lesdi Asiya fuu koofni on. Akilas e Piriskilla e nuɗɗinɓe mooɓtotooɓe nder saare maɓɓe fuu koofni on booɗɗum bee innde Jawmiraawo .

source: All the brethren greet you. Greet ye one another with an holy kiss.
target: Deerɗiraaɓe wonɓe haa ɗo fuu koofni on. Koofnindire, karlotire bana no ɗum haandani senaaɓe.

source: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand.
target: Ndaa ko mbinndumi bee juŋngo am: Min Pol mi hoofni on.

source: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ, let him be Anathema Maranatha.
target: To goɗɗo yiɗaa Jawmiraawo bee ɓernde woore, o laato naalaaɗo!  “Maranata”   waato war, yaa Jawmiraawo amin!

source: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.
target: Mo'ere Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu wondu bee mooɗon.

source: Adam, Seth, Enosh,
target: Ndaa danygol Aadamu: Aadamu danyi Setu, Setu danyi Enos,

source: Kenan, Mahalaleel, Jared,
target: Enos danyi Keenan, Keenan danyi Mahaleleel, Mahaleleel danyi Yarat,

source: Enoch, Methuselah, Lamech,
target: Yarat danyi Henok, Henok danyi Matusala, Matusala danyi Lamek, Lamek danyi Nuuhu,

source: Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
target: Nuuhu danyi Sem, Haamu bee Yafet.

source: The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Yafet ngoni: Gomer e Magog e Maday e Yawan e Tubal e Meesek e Tiras.

source: And the sons of Gomer; Ashkenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Gomer ngoni: Askanas e Difat  e Togarma.

source: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Yawan ngoni: Elisa e Tarsis e Kitti'en e Rodani'en.

source: The sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Haamu ngoni: Kus e Misrayim e Put e Kanaana.

source: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabtah, and Raamah, and Sabtecha. And the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Kus ngoni: Seba e Hawila e Sabeta e Rama e Sabitka. Ɓiɓɓe Rama ngoni: Saba e Dedan.

source: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be mighty upon the earth.
target: Kus danyi Nimrudu, kaŋko woni aartuɗo laataago baawɗo dow lesdi.

source: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,
target: Misrayim danyi Luudi'en e Anami'en e Lehabi'en e Naftu'en

source: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim,  and Caphtorim.
target: e Paturusi'en e Kaslu'en e Kaftori'en. Filisti'en iwi haa Kaslu'en.

source: And Canaan begat Zidon his firstborn, and Heth,
target: Kanaana danyi Sidon, afo muuɗum e Hetu

source: The Jebusite also, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,
target: e Yebusi'en e Amoori'en e Girgasi'en

source: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,
target: e Hewi'en e Arki'en e Siniti'en

source: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.
target: e Arwidi'en e Cemariti'en e Hamati'en.

source: The sons of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Sem ngoni: Elam e Assuru e Arfasada e Luuda e Aram e Uus e Hul e Geter e Meesek.

source: And Arphaxad begat Shelah, and Shelah begat Eber.
target: Arfasada danyi Selaha, Selaha danyi Eber.

source: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg; because in his days the earth was divided: and his brother's name was Joktan.
target: Eber danyanaama ɓiɓɓe worɓe ɗiɗo. Innde gooto, Pelek, ngam nder zamanu maako duniyaaru senndaama. Innde deerɗiiko boo, Yoktan.

source: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,
target: Yoktan danyi Almodat e Selef e Hacamawet e Yeraha

source: Hadoram also, and Uzal, and Diklah,
target: e Hadoram e Usal e Dikila

source: And Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,
target: e Ebal e Abimayel e Seba

source: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab. All these were the sons of Joktan.
target: e Ofir e Hawila e Yobaba. Fuu maɓɓe ɓe ɓiɓɓe Yoktan.

source: Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah,
target: Ndaa danygol Sem: Sem danyi Arfasada, Arfasada danyi Selaha, Selaha danyi

source: Eber, Peleg, Reu,
target: Eber, Eber danyi Pelek, Pelek danyi Re'u, Re'u danyi Saruku,

source: Serug, Nahor, Terah,
target: Saruku danyi Nahor, Nahor danyi Tara, Tara danyi Abraama,

source: Abram; the same is Abraham.
target: Abraama, kaŋko woni Ibrahiima.

source: The sons of Abraham; Isaac, and Ishmael.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Ibrahiima ngoni: Isiyaaku e Isma'iilu.

source: These are their generations: The firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,
target: Ndaa danygol maɓɓe: Nebayot woni afo Isma'iilu. Nden o danyi Keedar e Aɗɓe'el e Mipsaam

source: Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,
target: e Misma e Duuma e Massa e Hadat e Tema

source: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.
target: e Yetuuru e Naafis e Keduma. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Isma'iilu.

source: Now the sons of Keturah, Abraham's concubine: she bare Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan; Sheba, and Dedan.
target: Ɓe'e ngoni ɓiɓɓe Ketura, culaaɗo Ibrahiima: Zimran e Yoksan e Medaan e Mediyan e Yisbak e Suha. Ɓiɓɓe Yoksan boo: Seba e Dedan.

source: And the sons of Midian; Ephah, and Epher, and Hanoch, and Abida, and Eldaah. All these are the sons of Keturah.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Mediyan boo: Efa e Efer e Hanok e Abida e Elda'a. Ɓe fuu ɓe yimɓe danygol Ketura.

source: And Abraham begat Isaac. The sons of Isaac; Esau and Israel.
target: Ibrahiima danyi Isiyaaku. Ɓe'e ngoni ɓiɓɓe Isiyaaku: Isuwa e Isra'iila.

source: The sons of Esau; Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Isuwa boo: Elifas e Re'uwel e Ye'us e Ya'alaam e Koora.

source: The sons of Eliphaz; Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Elifas boo: Teman e Omar e Cefi e Gatam e Kenas e Timna e Amalek.

source: The sons of Reuel; Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Re'uwel boo: Nahat e Zeraha e Samma e Misa.

source: And the sons of Seir; Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan.
target: Ɓe'e ngoni ɓiɓɓe Se'ir: Lotan e Sobal e Cibe'on e Ana e Dison e Ecer e Disan.

source: And the sons of Lotan; Hori, and Homam: and Timna was Lotan's sister.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Lotan boo: Hori e Homam. Timna, ɗum deerɗiraawo Lotan debbo.

source: The sons of Shobal; Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon; Aiah, and Anah.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Sobal boo: Aliyan e Manahat e Ebal e Cefi e Onam. Ɓiɓɓe Cibe'on boo: Aya e Ana.

source: The sons of Anah; Dishon. And the sons of Dishon; Amram, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
target: Ɓii Ana boo, Dison. Ɓiɓɓe Dison boo: Hamran e Esban e Yituran e Keran.

source: The sons of Ezer; Bilhan, and Zaavan, and Jakan. The sons of Dishan; Uz, and Aran.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Ezer boo: Bilhan e Za'awan e Ya'akan. Ɓiɓɓe Disan boo: Uus e Aaran.

source: Now these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom before any king reigned over the children of Israel; Bela the son of Beor: and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
target: Ndaa inɗe laamiiɓe Edoomi'en diga Isra'iila walaano laamiiɗo: Bela ɓii Be'or, innde wuro maako Dinhaba.

source: And when Bela was dead, Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.
target: Bela maayi. Yobaba ɓii Zeraha mo Bosra laami haa pellel maako.

source: And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.
target: Yobaba maayi. Husam mo lesdi Temani'en laami haa pellel maako.

source: And when Husham was dead, Hadad the son of Bedad, which smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Avith.
target: Husam maayi. Hadat ɓii Bedaada, mo jaali Mediyan nder lesdi Mo'ab, laami haa pellel maako. Innde wuro maako, Awit.

source: And when Hadad was dead, Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.
target: Hadat maayi. Samla mo Masreeka laami haa pellel maako.

source: And when Samlah was dead, Shaul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his stead.
target: Samla maayi. Sawulu mo Rehobot-dow-Maayo laami haa pellel maako.

source: And when Shaul was dead, Baal–hanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.
target: Sawulu maayi. Ba'al-Hanan ɓii Akbor laami haa pellel maako.

source: And when Baal–hanan was dead, Hadad reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Pau; and his wife's name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.
target: Ba'al-Hanan maayi. Hadat laami haa pellel maako. Innde wuro maako, Pa'i. Innde debbo maako, Mehetabeyel ɓii Matireeda ɓii Mezahat.

source: Hadad died also. And the dukes of Edom were; duke Timnah, duke Alvah, duke Jetheth,
target: Hadat maayi. Ndaa yimɓe ɓe ardani lesdi Edoom: Timna, Aliya e Yetet,

source: Duke Aholibamah, duke Elah, duke Pinon,
target: Oholibama e Ela e Pinon,

source: Duke Kenaz, duke Teman, duke Mibzar,
target: Kenas e Teman e Mipsaara,

source: Duke Magdiel, duke Iram. These are the dukes of Edom.
target: Magdiyel e Iram. Kamɓe ngoni ardiiɓe Edoom.

source: These are the sons of Israel; Reuben, Simeon, Levi, and Judah, Issachar, and Zebulun,
target: Ɓiɓɓe Isra'iila ngoni: Ruben, Simeyon, Lewi, Yahuuda, Issakar, Zabulon,

source: Dan, Joseph, and Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.
target: Dan, Yusufu, Benyamin, Neftali, Gada, Aser.

source: The sons of Judah; Er, and Onan, and Shelah: which three were born unto him of the daughter of Shua the Canaanitess. And Er, the firstborn of Judah, was evil in the sight of the  Lord ; and he slew him.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Yahuuda tato ɓe ɓii Su'a Kanaaniijo danyani mo ngoni: Eer e Oonan e Sela. Ammaa Eer, afo Yahuuda o kalluɗo yeeso Jawmiraawo, Jawmiraawo mbari mo.

source: And Tamar his daughter in law bare him Pharez and Zerah. All the sons of Judah were five.
target: Ammaa Tamar, esiiko debbo danyani mo Peres e Zeraha. Ɓiɓɓe Yahuuda worɓe fuu, ɓe njowo.

source: The sons of Pharez; Hezron, and Hamul.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Peres ngoni: Hesruunu e Hamul.

source: And the sons of Zerah; Zimri, and Ethan, and Heman, and Calcol, and Dara: five of them in all.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Zeraha ngoni: Zimiri e Etan e Heman e Kalkol e Dara, fuu maɓɓe, ɓe njowo.

source: And the sons of Carmi; Achar, the troubler of Israel, who transgressed in the thing accursed.
target: Ɓii Karmi boo, Akar mo nastini Isra'iila nder sarru ngam o yewi umroore Allah, o hoo'i kuuje kaɗaaɗe .

source: And the sons of Ethan; Azariah.
target: Ɓii Etan boo, Azariya.

source: The sons also of Hezron, that were born unto him; Jerahmeel, and Ram, and Chelubai.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Hesruunu danyanaaɓe mo ngoni: Yerahameel e Ram e Kelubay.

source: And Ram begat Amminadab; and Amminadab begat Nahshon, prince of the children of Judah;
target: Ram danyi Amminadabu, Amminadabu danyi Nahasunu, ardiiɗo ɓiɓɓe Yahuuda.

source: And Nahshon begat Salma, and Salma begat Boaz,
target: Nahasunu danyi Salma, Salma danyi Bo'es,

source: And Boaz begat Obed, and Obed begat Jesse,
target: Bo'es danyi Obet, Obet danyi Yessa.

source: And Jesse begat his firstborn Eliab, and Abinadab the second, and Shimma the third,
target: Yessa danyi Eliyabu, afo muuɗum, nden Abinadabu ɗiɗaɓo e Sim'a tataɓo

source: Nethaneel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,
target: e Netaneyel nayaɓo e Radday njowaɓo

source: Ozem the sixth, David the seventh:
target: e Ocem njoweegoojo e Daawuda njoweeɗiɗaɓo.

source: Whose sisters were Zeruiah, and Abigail. And the sons of Zeruiah; Abishai, and Joab, and Asahel, three.
target: Deerɗiraaɓe maɓɓe rewɓe ngoni: Seruyatu e Abigayil. Ɓiɓɓe Seruyatu boo: Abisay e Yo'ab e Asa'el, ɓe tato.

source: And Abigail bare Amasa: and the father of Amasa was Jether the Ishmaelite.
target: Abigayil danyi Amasa. Baaba Amasa, Yeter Isma'iiluujo.

source: And Caleb the son of Hezron begat children of Azubah his wife, and of Jerioth: her sons are these; Jesher, and Shobab, and Ardon.
target: Kaaleb ɓii Hesruunu danydi bee debbo muuɗum Ajuba e bee Yeri'ot. Ajuba danyi Yeser e Soobaba e Ardon.

source: And when Azubah was dead, Caleb took unto him Ephrath, which bare him Hur.
target: Nden Ajuba maayi. Kaaleb ɓaŋgi Efratu, kaŋko danyani mo Huuru.

source: And Hur begat Uri, and Uri begat Bezaleel.
target: Huuru danyi Uuri, Uuri danyi Becaleel.

source: And afterward Hezron went in to the daughter of Machir the father of Gilead, whom he married when he was threescore years old; and she bare him Segub.
target: Ɓaawo maajum Hesruunu waaldi bee ɓii Makir debbo, Makir woni baaba Gile'at. Hesruunu marno duuɓi cappanɗe joweego saa'i o ɓaŋga debbo man. O danyani mo Seguba.

source: And Segub begat Jair, who had three and twenty cities in the land of Gilead.
target: Seguba danyi Ya'ir mo mari gure noogas e tati nder lesdi Gile'at.

source: And he took Geshur, and Aram, with the towns of Jair, from them, with Kenath, and the towns thereof, even threescore cities. All these belonged to the sons of Machir the father of Gilead.
target: Ammaa yimɓe Gesur e Siriya kooci gure Ya'ir haa maɓɓe, non boo berniwol Kenat e gure maagol, waato gure cappanɗe joweego. Kamɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Makir, baaba Gile'at.

source: And after that Hezron was dead in Caleb–ephratah, then Abiah Hezron's wife bare him Ashur the father of Tekoa.
target: Ɓaawo maayde Hesruunu haa Kaaleb-Efratu, Abiya debbo maako danyani mo Askuru, baaba Teko'a.

source: And the sons of Jerahmeel the firstborn of Hezron were, Ram the firstborn, and Bunah, and Oren, and Ozem, and Ahijah.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Yerahameel, afo Hesruunu ngoni: Ram, afo maako e Buna e Oren e Ocem e Ahiya.

source: Jerahmeel had also another wife, whose name was Atarah; she was the mother of Onam.
target: Yerahameel woodi boo debbo feere, innde maako Atara. Kaŋko woni daada Onam.

source: And the sons of Ram the firstborn of Jerahmeel were, Maaz, and Jamin, and Eker.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Ram, afo Yerahameel ngoni: Ma'as e Yamin e Eker.

source: And the sons of Onam were, Shammai, and Jada. And the sons of Shammai; Nadab, and Abishur.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Onam boo: Sammay e Yada. Ɓiɓɓe Sammay boo: Nadab e Abisuru.

source: And the name of the wife of Abishur was Abihail, and she bare him Ahban, and Molid.
target: Innde debbo Abisuru, Abihayil. Kaŋko danyani mo Ahaban e Molidi.

source: And the sons of Nadab; Seled, and Appaim: but Seled died without children.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Nadab ngoni: Selet e Appayim. Selet maayi, heɓaay ɓikkoy.

source: And the sons of Appaim; Ishi. And the sons of Ishi; Sheshan. And the children of Sheshan; Ahlai.
target: Ɓii Appayim boo, Yisi. Ɓii Yisi boo, Seesan. Ɓii Seesan boo, Ahilay.

source: And the sons of Jada the brother of Shammai; Jether, and Jonathan: and Jether died without children.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Yada, deerɗu Sammay ngoni: Yeter e Yonatan. Yeter maayi, heɓaay ɓikkoy.

source: And the sons of Jonathan; Peleth, and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Yonatan boo: Pelet e Zaaza. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Yerahameel.

source: Now Sheshan had no sons, but daughters. And Sheshan had a servant, an Egyptian, whose name was Jarha.
target: Ammaa Seesan walaa ɓiɓɓe worɓe, sey rewɓe. Seesan woodi maccuɗo Misraajo, innde maako Yarha.

source: And Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha his servant to wife; and she bare him Attai.
target: Seesan te'ni maccuɗo muuɗum Yarha ɓiyum debbo. Kaŋko o danyani mo Attay.

source: And Attai begat Nathan, and Nathan begat Zabad,
target: Attay danyi Natan, Natan danyi Zabada,

source: And Zabad begat Ephlal, and Ephlal begat Obed,
target: Zabada danyi Efilal, Efilal danyi Obet,

source: And Obed begat Jehu, and Jehu begat Azariah,
target: Obet danyi Yeehu, Yeehu danyi Azariya,

source: And Azariah begat Helez, and Helez begat Eleasah,
target: Azariya danyi Heeles, Heeles danyi El'aasa,

source: And Eleasah begat Sisamai, and Sisamai begat Shallum,
target: El'aasa danyi Sismay, Sismay danyi Sallum,

source: And Shallum begat Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begat Elishama.
target: Sallum danyi Yekamiya, Yekamiya danyi Eliisama.

source: Now the sons of Caleb the brother of Jerahmeel were, Mesha his firstborn, which was the father of Ziph; and the sons of Mareshah the father of Hebron.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Kaaleb, deerɗiraawo Yerahameel ngoni: Afo maako, Meesa, baaba Zif e ɓiɓɓe Maresa, baaba Heburuun.

source: And the sons of Hebron; Korah, and Tappuah, and Rekem, and Shema.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Heburuun boo: Koora e Tappuha e Rekem e Sema.

source: And Shema begat Raham, the father of Jorkoam: and Rekem begat Shammai.
target: Sema danyi Raham, baaba Yorke'am. Rekem danyi Sammay.

source: And the son of Shammai was Maon: and Maon was the father of Beth–zur.
target: Ɓii Sammay boo, Ma'on. Ma'on woni baaba Bayti-Cura.

source: And Ephah, Caleb's concubine, bare Haran, and Moza, and Gazez: and Haran begat Gazez.
target: Efa, culaaɗo Kaaleb danyi Haran e Moosa e Gaajes. Haran danyi Gaajes.

source: And the sons of Jahdai; Regem, and Jotham, and Geshan, and Pelet, and Ephah, and Shaaph.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Yaaday ngoni: Regem e Yotam e Geesan e Pelet e Efa e Sa'af.

source: Maachah, Caleb's concubine, bare Sheber, and Tirhanah.
target: Ma'aka, culaaɗo Kaaleb danyi Seber e Tirhana.

source: She bare also Shaaph the father of Madmannah, Sheva the father of Machbenah, and the father of Gibea: and the daughter of Caleb was Achsah.
target: Nden o danyi Sa'af, baaba Madamanna e Sewu, baaba Makabena e baaba Gibiya. Ɓii Kaaleb debbo boo, Aksa.

source: These were the sons of Caleb the son of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah; Shobal the father of Kirjath–jearim,
target: Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Kaaleb. Ɓiɓɓe Huuru, afo Efratu debbo Kaaleb ngoni: Sobal, baaba Kiriyat-Ye'arim

source: Salma the father of Beth–lehem, Hareph the father of Beth–gader.
target: e Salma, baaba Baytilaama e Haref, baaba Bayti-Gader.

source: And Shobal the father of Kirjath–jearim had sons; Haroeh, and half of the Manahethites.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Sobal, baaba Kiriyat-Ye'arim ngoni: Haroye e reeta Manooha'en.

source: And the families of Kirjath–jearim; the Ithrites, and the Puhites, and the Shumathites, and the Mishraites; of them came the Zorathites, and the Eshtaulites.
target: Ci'e nder danygol Kiriyat-Ye'arim ngoni: Yitiri'en e Puti'en e Sumati'en e Misirayi'en. Haa maɓɓe yimɓe Cor'a e Estawol iwi.

source: The sons of Salma; Beth–lehem, and the Netophathites, Ataroth, the house of Joab, and half of the Manahethites, the Zorites.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Salma ngoni: Baytilaama e Netofa'en e Atarot-Bayti-Yo'ab e reeta Manooha'en e Cor'i'en.

source: And the families of the scribes which dwelt at Jabez; the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, and Suchathites. These are the Kenites that came of Hemath, the father of the house of Rechab.
target: Geɓe nder lenyol winndooɓe jooɗiiɓe haa Ya'bes ngoni: Tirati'en e Simati'en e Sukati'en. Kamɓe ngoni Keni'en iwɓe haa Hammat, baaba saare Rekab.

source: Now these were the sons of David, which were born unto him in Hebron; the firstborn Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess:
target: Ndaa ɓe'e ngoni ɓiɓɓe Daawuda danyaaɓe haa Heburuun: Amnon, afo maako, innde daada mum Ahino'am mo Yisre'el. Daniyel, ɗiɗaɓo, innde daada mum Abigayil mo Karmel.

source: The third, Absalom the son of Maacah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur: the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith:
target: Absalom, tataɓo, innde daada mum Ma'aka ɓii Talmay, Talmay boo o laamiiɗo Gesur. Adoniya, nayaɓo, innde daada mum Haggit.

source: The fifth, Shephatiah of Abital: the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife.
target: Sefatiya, njowaɓo, innde daada mum Abital. Yitiriyam, njoweegoojo, innde daada mum Egila, debbo Daawuda.

source: These six were born unto him in Hebron; and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Daawuda njoweego ɓe'e fuu ndanyaama haa Heburuun. Daawuda laami ton duuɓi joweeɗiɗi e lebbi joweego. Nden o laami haa Urusaliima duuɓi cappanɗe tati e tati .

source: And these were born unto him in Jerusalem; Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bath–shua the daughter of Ammiel:
target: Ndaa ɓe o danyi haa Urusaliima: Sim'a e Sobaba e Natan e Suleymaanu. Daada maɓɓe, Bat-Su'a ɓii Ammiyel debbo. Ɓe nayo .

source: Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,
target: Daawuda danyi boo Yibehar e Eliisama e Elifelet

source: And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
target: e Nooga e Nefek e Yafiya

source: And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.
target: e Eliisama e Eliyada e Elifelet, ɓe njoweenayo.

source: These were all the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.
target: Ɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Daawuda, ɓiɓɓe sulaaɓe limaaka. Tamar woni deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo.

source: And Solomon's son was Rehoboam, Abia his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,
target: Ndaa ɓe'e ngoni danygol Suleymaanu: Suleymaanu danyi Robo'am, Robo'am danyi Abiya, Abiya danyi Asa, Asa danyi Yusafat,

source: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,
target: Yusafat danyi Yehoram, Yehoram danyi Ahaziya, Ahaziya danyi Yo'as,

source: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,
target: Yo'as danyi Amasiya, Amasiya danyi Azariya, Azariya danyi Yotam,

source: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,
target: Yotam danyi Akas, Akas danyi Hezekiya, Hezekiya danyi Manassa,

source: Amon his son, Josiah his son.
target: Manassa danyi Amon, Amon danyi Yusiya.

source: And the sons of Josiah were, the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Yusiya ngoni: Yohanan woni afo maako, Yooyakim, ɗiɗaɓo, Sedekiya, tataɓo, Sallum, nayaɓo.

source: And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.
target: Danygol Yooyakim boo: Yooyakim danyi Yekoniya e Yekoniya danyi Sedekiya.

source: And the sons of Jeconiah; Assir, Salathiel his son,
target: Ɓiɓɓe Yekoniya kaɓɓaaɗo boo ngoni: Salatiyel

source: Malchiram also, and Pedaiah, and Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
target: e Malkiram e Pedaya e Senaccar e Yekamiya e Hosama e Nedabiya.

source: And the sons of Pedaiah were, Zerubbabel, and Shimei: and the sons of Zerubbabel; Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister:
target: Ɓiɓɓe Pedaya boo: Zorobaabila e Sim'i. Ɓiɓɓe Zorobaabila boo: Mesullam e Hananiya. Selomit woni deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo.

source: And Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushab–hesed, five.
target: O danyi boo Hasuba e Oheel e Berekiya e Hasadiya e Yusab-Hesed, ɓe njowo.

source: And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.
target: Danygol Hananiya boo: Pelatiya e Yesa'ya e ɓiɓɓe Refaya e Arnan e Obadiya e Sekaniya.

source: And the sons of Shechaniah; Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah; Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.
target: Ɓii Sekaniya boo, Sema'ya. Ɓiɓɓe Sema'ya boo: Hattus e Yigal e Bariyak e Ne'ariya e Safat, njoweego.

source: And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Ne'ariya boo: Eliyo'enay e Hezekiya e Azrikam, ɓe tato.

source: And the sons of Elioenai were, Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Dalaiah, and Anani, seven.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Eliyo'enay boo: Hodawiya e Eliyasib e Pelaya e Akkubu e Yohanan e Delaya e Anani, ɓe njoweeɗiɗo.

source: The sons of Judah; Pharez, Hezron, and Carmi, and Hur, and Shobal.
target: Ndaa danygol Yahuuda: Yahuuda danyi Peres, Peres danyi Hesruunu, Hesruunu danyi Karmi, Karmi danyi Huuru, Huuru danyi Sobal.

source: And Reaiah the son of Shobal begat Jahath; and Jahath begat Ahumai, and Lahad. These are the families of the Zorathites.
target: Re'aya ɓii Sobal danyi Yahat, Yahat danyi Ahumay e Lahat. Ɗum ci'e Cor'ati'en.

source: And these were of the father of Etam; Jezreel, and Ishma, and Idbash: and the name of their sister was Hazelelponi:
target: Ndaa danygol baaba Etam: Yisre'el e Yisma e Yidbas. Innde deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo boo, Hacalelponi.

source: And Penuel the father of Gedor, and Ezer the father of Hushah. These are the sons of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah, the father of Beth–lehem.
target: Nden Penuwel, baaba Gedor e Ezer, baaba Husa. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Huuru, afo Efratu, Huuru woni baaba Baytilaama boo.

source: And Ashur the father of Tekoa had two wives, Helah and Naarah.
target: Askuru, baaba Teko'a woodi rewɓe ɗiɗo: Heleya e Na'ara.

source: And Naarah bare him Ahuzam, and Hepher, and Temeni, and Haahashtari. These were the sons of Naarah.
target: Na'ara danyani mo Ahujam e Hefer e Temni e Ahastaari. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Na'ara.

source: And the sons of Helah were, Zereth, and Jezoar, and Ethnan.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Heleya boo: Seret e Cohar e Etanan.

source: And Coz begat Anub, and Zobebah, and the families of Aharhel the son of Harum.
target: Koos danyi Anuba e Sobeba. Ci'e nder danygol Aharhel ɓii Harum boo iwi haa maako.

source: And Jabez was more honourable than his brethren: and his mother called his name Jabez, saying, Because I bare him with sorrow.
target: Ya'bes heɓi tedduŋgal ɓuri deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum. Daada maako hokki mo innde Ya'bes ngam bee bone o danyiri mo.

source: And Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, Oh that thou wouldest bless me indeed, and enlarge my coast, and that thine hand might be with me, and that thou wouldest keep me from evil, that it may not grieve me! And God granted him that which he requested.
target: Ya'bes tori Allah Isra'iila, wi'i: “Barkiɗinam, yaajin maral am, juŋngo ma faddo yam, daaynanam sarru ngam taa mi yara bone!” Allah jaɓani mo ko o tori.

source: And Chelub the brother of Shuah begat Mehir, which was the father of Eshton.
target: Kelub, deerɗiraawo Suha danyi Mehir, kaŋko woni baaba Eston.

source: And Eshton begat Beth–rapha, and Paseah, and Tehinnah the father of Ir–nahash. These are the men of Rechah.
target: Eston danyi Bayti-Rafa e Paseha e Tehinna, baaba berniwol Nahas. Kamɓe ngoni yimɓe Reka.

source: And the sons of Kenaz; Othniel, and Seraiah: and the sons of Othniel; Hathath.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Kenas ngoni: Otniyel e Seraya. Ɓiɓɓe Otniyel boo: Hatat e Me'onotay.

source: And Meonothai begat Ophrah: and Seraiah begat Joab, the father of the valley of Charashim; for they were craftsmen.
target: Me'onotay danyi Ofra. Seraya danyi Yo'ab, baaba Waadiwol-Sanaa'a, ngam ɓe waɗooɓe sanaa'a.

source: And the sons of Caleb the son of Jephunneh; Iru, Elah, and Naam: and the sons of Elah, even Kenaz.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Kaaleb ɓii Yefunna ngoni: Iiru e Ela e Na'am. Ɓii Ela boo, Kenas.

source: And the sons of Jehaleleel; Ziph, and Ziphah, Tiria, and Asareel.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Yehallelel ngoni: Zif e Zifa e Tiriya e Asariilu.

source: And the sons of his wife Hodiah the sister of Naham, the father of Keilah the Garmite, and Eshtemoa the Maachathite.
target: Ɓiɓɓe debbo Hodiyya, deerɗiraawo Naham debbo ngoni: Baaba Ke'ila Garmiijo e Estemo'a Ma'akatiijo.

source: And the sons of Shimon were, Amnon, and Rinnah, Ben–hanan, and Tilon. And the sons of Ishi were, Zoheth, and Ben–zoheth.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Simona ngoni: Amnon e Rimna e Ben-Hanan e Tilon. Ɓiɓɓe Yisi ngoni: Zohet e Ben-Zohet.

source: The sons of Shelah the son of Judah were, Er the father of Lecah, and Laadah the father of Mareshah, and the families of the house of them that wrought fine linen, of the house of Ashbea,
target: Ɓiɓɓe Sela ɓii Yahuuda ngoni: Eer, baaba Leka e La'eda, baaba Maresa, non boo ci'e sannyooɓe limce ɗigguɗe haa Bayti-Asbeha.
