source: And Jokim, and the men of Chozeba, and Joash, and Saraph, who had the dominion in Moab, and Jashubi–lehem. And these are ancient things.
target: Fahin Yokim e worɓe wuro Kojeba e Yo'as e Saraf, laamaniiɓe Mo'ab, ɓaawoɗon ɓe ngarti Yasubi-Lahem. Kuuje ɗe'e ɗe ɓooymaaje.

source: These were the potters, and those that dwelt among plants and hedges: there they dwelt with the king for his work.
target: Kamɓe ɓe mahooɓe payanɗe, ɓe ɗon njooɗi haa Neta'im e Gedera, kommbi laamiiɗo, ɓe ɗon kuuwana ɗum.

source: The sons of Simeon were, Nemuel, and Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, and Shaul:
target: Ɓiɓɓe Simeyon ngoni: Nemuwel e Yamin e Yariba e Zeraha e Sawulu.

source: Shallum his son, Mibsam his son, Mishma his son.
target: Ɓii Sawulu, Sallum on. Ɓii Sallum boo, Mipsaam. Ɓii Mipsaam boo, Misma.

source: And the sons of Mishma; Hamuel his son, Zacchur his son, Shimei his son.
target: Danygol Misma boo: Misma danyi Hamuwel, Hamuwel danyi Zakkur, Zakkur danyi Sim'i.

source: And Shimei had sixteen sons and six daughters; but his brethren had not many children, neither did all their family multiply, like to the children of Judah.
target: Sim'i woodi ɓiɓɓe worɓe sappo e njoweego e ɓiɓɓe rewɓe njoweego. Ammaa deerɗiraaɓe maako fuu ngalaa ɓiɓɓe ɗuuɗɓe, yimɓe saare maɓɓe yottaaki limgal ɓiɓɓe Yahuuda.

source: And they dwelt at Beer–sheba, and Moladah, and Hazar–shual,
target: Ɓe ɗon njooɗi haa Biirsaba e Molada e Hacar-Su'al.

source: And at Bilhah, and at Ezem, and at Tolad,
target: Non boo haa Bilha e Esem e Tolat,

source: And at Bethuel, and at Hormah, and at Ziklag,
target: haa Betu'iila e Horma e Cikilak,

source: And at Beth–marcaboth, and Hazar–susim, and at Beth–biri, and at Shaaraim. These were their cities unto the reign of David.
target: haa Bayti-Markabot e Hacar-Susim e Bayti-Biri e Saarayim. Kanji ngonno berniiji maɓɓe diga Daawuda laamaaki tawon

source: And their villages were, Etam, and Ain, Rimmon, and Tochen, and Ashan, five cities:
target: bee gure maɓɓe. Etaam e Ayin e Rimmon e Token e Asan, berniiji jowi,

source: And all their villages that were round about the same cities, unto Baal. These were their habitations, and their genealogy.
target: bee gure maɓɓe piltuɗe berniiji ɗi'i fuu, haa yotti Ba'al. Kanje ngoni joole maɓɓe, ɓe mbinndi boo deftere asli maɓɓe .

source: And Meshobab, and Jamlech, and Joshah the son of Amaziah,
target: Mesobab e Yamlek e Yoosa ɓii Amasiya

source: And Joel, and Jehu the son of Josibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,
target: e Yo'el e Yeehu, ɓii Yosibiya, ɓii Seraya, ɓii Asiyel

source: And Elioenai, and Jaakobah, and Jeshohaiah, and Asaiah, and Adiel, and Jesimiel, and Benaiah,
target: e Eliyo'enay e Yakoba e Yesohaya e Asaya e Adiyel e Yesimiyel e Benaya

source: And Ziza the son of Shiphi, the son of Allon, the son of Jedaiah, the son of Shimri, the son of Shemaiah;
target: e Ziza ɓii Sifi, ɓii Allon, ɓii Yedaya, ɓii Simiri, ɓii Sema'ya,

source: These mentioned by their names were princes in their families: and the house of their fathers increased greatly.
target: ɓe'e limtaaɓe innde innde laati ardiiɓe ci'e , ci'e maɓɓe ɗuuɗi masin.

source: And they went to the entrance of Gedor, even unto the east side of the valley, to seek pasture for their flocks.
target: Ngam maajum ɓe ndilli nastirde Gedor haa yotti fuunaaŋge waadiwol, haa ɓe ɗaɓɓita durduɗe ngam dammooji maɓɓe.

source: And they found fat pasture and good, and the land was wide, and quiet, and peaceable; for they of Ham had dwelt there of old.
target: Ɓe keɓi durduɗe booɗɗe, nafooje, non boo lesdi njaasndi koo toy fuu bee de'ere e jam, ngam jooɗiiɓe ton naane ɓe danygol Haamu.

source: And these written by name came in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah, and smote their tents, and the habitations that were found there, and destroyed them utterly unto this day, and dwelt in their rooms: because there was pasture there for their flocks.
target: Limtaaɓe innde innde go ngari nder zamanu Hezekiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, ɓe kalki laymaaji ɓeya e Me'uni'en jooɗiiɓe ton, ɓe nattini ɓe haa wargo hannde. Ɓe njooɗi haa pellel maɓɓe, ngam durduɗe ɗon ton ngam dammooji maɓɓe.

source: And some of them, even of the sons of Simeon, five hundred men, went to mount Seir, having for their captains Pelatiah, and Neariah, and Rephaiah, and Uzziel, the sons of Ishi.
target: Woɗɓe nder yimɓe Simeyon, worɓe teemeɗɗe njowo njehi haa hooseere Se'ir. Pelatiya e Ne'ariya e Refaya e Uzziyel, ɓiɓɓe Yisi ardi ɓe.

source: And they smote the rest of the Amalekites that were escaped, and dwelt there unto this day.
target: Ɓe mbari daɗɓe Amaleki'en luttuɓe, nden ɓe njooɗi ton haa wargo hannde.

source: Now the sons of Reuben the firstborn of Israel, (for he was the firstborn; but, forasmuch as he defiled his father's bed, his birthright was given unto the sons of Joseph the son of Israel: and the genealogy is not to be reckoned after the birthright.
target: Ruben woni afo baaba muuɗum. Ammaa o huuwi cemtiniiɗum, o waaldi bee culaaɗo baaba maako. Ngam maajum daraja afaaku maako hokkaama ɓiɓɓe Yusufu ɓii Isra'iila. Innde maako nastaay deftere asli fodde afaaku .

source: For Judah prevailed above his brethren, and of him came the chief ruler; but the birthright was Joseph's:)
target: Yahuuda laati mawɗo caka deerɗum'en, gooto diga danygol maako boo laati ardiiɗo. Ammaa daraja afaaku laatani Yusufu .

source: The sons, I say, of Reuben the firstborn of Israel were, Hanoch, and Pallu, Hezron, and Carmi.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Ruben, afo Isra'iila ngoni: Hanok e Pallu e Hesruunu e Karmi.

source: The sons of Joel; Shemaiah his son, Gog his son, Shimei his son,
target: Ndaa danygol Yo'el: Yo'el danyi Sema'ya, Sema'ya danyi Gog, Gog danyi Sim'i,

source: Micah his son, Reaia his son, Baal his son,
target: Sim'i danyi Mika, Mika danyi Re'aya, Re'aya danyi Ba'al,

source: Beerah his son, whom Tilgath–pilneser king of Assyria carried away captive: he was prince of the Reubenites.
target: Ba'al danyi Beera. O hooreejo yimɓe Ruben. Tigilat-Pileser, laamiiɗo Assuura dahi mo .

source: And his brethren by their families, when the genealogy of their generations was reckoned, were the chief, Jeiel, and Zechariah,
target: Banndiraaɓe maako fodde ci'e maɓɓe mbinndaama e nastinaama nder deftere asli bana ni'i: Ye'iyel woni arano, nden Zekariya

source: And Bela the son of Azaz, the son of Shema, the son of Joel, who dwelt in Aroer, even unto Nebo and Baal–meon:
target: e Bela ɓii Azaza ɓii Sema ɓii Yo'el. Kaŋko o jooɗi haa Aro'er haa yotti Nebo e Ba'al-Me'on.

source: And eastward he inhabited unto the entering in of the wilderness from the river Euphrates: because their cattle were multiplied in the land of Gilead.
target: Heedi fuunaaŋge o jooɗi haa yotti nastirde ladde gaa'e maayo Efratis, ngam yimɓe maako marno tokke ɗuuɗɗe nder lesdi Gile'at.

source: And in the days of Saul they made war with the Hagarites, who fell by their hand: and they dwelt in their tents throughout all the east land of Gilead.
target: Nder zamanu laamiiɗo Sawulu ɓe mbaɗi konu bee Hagari'en, ɓe njaali ɓe. Nden ɓe njooɗi nder cuuɗi Hagari'en haa lesdi Gile'at fuunaaŋgeeri fuu.

source: And the children of Gad dwelt over against them, in the land of Bashan unto Salecah:
target: Yimɓe Gada njooɗi, tiitotiri bee yimɓe Ruben nder lesdi Baasan haa yotti Salka:

source: Joel the chief, and Shapham the next, and Jaanai, and Shaphat in Bashan.
target: Yo'el arano, Safam ɗiɗaɓo, nden Ya'anay e Safat nder Baasan.

source: And their brethren of the house of their fathers were, Michael, and Meshullam, and Sheba, and Jorai, and Jachan, and Zia, and Heber, seven.
target: Banndiraaɓe maɓɓe fodde ci'e maɓɓe ngoni: Mika'iilu e Mesullam e Seba e Yoray e Ya'akan e Ziya e Eber, ɓe njoweeɗiɗo.

source: These are the children of Abihail the son of Huri, the son of Jaroah, the son of Gilead, the son of Michael, the son of Jeshishai, the son of Jahdo, the son of Buz;
target: Ɓe ɓiɓɓe Abihayil ɓii Huuri ɓii Yaroha ɓii Gile'at ɓii Mika'iilu ɓii Yesisay ɓii Yahado ɓii Bus.

source: Ahi the son of Abdiel, the son of Guni, chief of the house of their fathers.
target: Ahi ɓii Abdiyel ɓii Guni woni baaba saare maɓɓe.

source: And they dwelt in Gilead in Bashan, and in her towns, and in all the suburbs of Sharon, upon their borders.
target: Kamɓe ɓe njooɗi nder lesɗe Gile'at e Baasan e nder gure maaje, non boo haa durduɗe Saron haa yotti keeri maaje.

source: All these were reckoned by genealogies in the days of Jotham king of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam king of Israel.
target: Ɓe fuu ɓe mbinndaama nder deftere asli nder zamanu Yotam, laamiiɗo Yahuuda e Yerobo'am laamiiɗo Isra'iila.

source: The sons of Reuben, and the Gadites, and half the tribe of Manasseh, of valiant men, men able to bear buckler and sword, and to shoot with bow, and skilful in war, were four and forty thousand seven hundred and threescore, that went out to the war.
target: Yimɓe Ruben e yimɓe Gada e reeta lenyol Manassa, worɓe honooɓe, jogiiɓe bawarɗe  e kaafaaje, tirooɓe lagaaje, waawɓe konu fuu, taaskaniiɓe haɓre, limgal maɓɓe waɗi ujine cappanɗe nayo e nayo e teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo e cappanɗe njoweego .

source: And they made war with the Hagarites, with Jetur, and Naphish, and Nodab.
target: Ɓe mbaɗi konu bee Hagari'en e yimɓe Yetuuru e Naafis e Nodaba.

source: And they were helped against them, and the Hagarites were delivered into their hand, and all that were with them: for they cried to God in the battle, and he was entreated of them; because they put their trust in him.
target: Nder haɓre ɓe tori Allah, kaŋko o jaɓi tornde maɓɓe ngam ɓe ɗon kooli mo. O walli ɓe haɓugo bee konne'en maɓɓe, o hokki ɓe jaalorgal dow Hagari'en e wonduɓe bee maɓɓe.

source: And they took away their cattle; of their camels fifty thousand, and of sheep two hundred and fifty thousand, and of asses two thousand, and of men an hundred thousand.
target: Ɓe kooci dabbaaji konne'en maɓɓe: Geelooɗi ujine cappanɗe jowi  e dammooji ujine teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi e cappanɗe jowi  e bamɗe ujine ɗiɗi , non boo yimɓe ujine teemerre .

source: For there fell down many slain, because the war was of God. And they dwelt in their steads until the captivity.
target: Naawnaaɓe ɗuuɗɓe maayi, ngam Allah bee hoore muuɗum waɗi haɓre maajum. Ɓaawoɗon yimɓe le'i ɗiɗi e reeta go njooɗi haa pellel ɓeya haa yotti saa'i daheeki.

source: And the children of the half tribe of Manasseh dwelt in the land: they increased from Bashan unto Baal–hermon and Senir, and unto mount Hermon.
target: Yimɓe reeta lenyol Manassa njooɗi haa lesdi maajum diga Baasan haa yotti Ba'al-Hermoon e Seniira e hooseere Hermoon, ɓe ɗuuɗɓe masin.

source: And these were the heads of the house of their fathers, even Epher, and Ishi, and Eliel, and Azriel, and Jeremiah, and Hodaviah, and Jahdiel, mighty men of valour, famous men, and heads of the house of their fathers.
target: Ndaa ɓe'e ngoni baaba-ci'e'en  maɓɓe: Efer e Yisi e Eliyel e Ajiriyel e Yeremiya e Hodawiya e Yahadiyel, ɓe fuu ɓe honooɓe semmbiɗɓe, worɓe tedduɓe.

source: And they transgressed against the God of their fathers, and went a whoring after the gods of the people of the land, whom God destroyed before them.
target: Yimɓe lenyol Ruben bee Gada e reeta lenyol Manassa ngewi umroore Allah kaakiraaɓe muuɗum'en, ɓe ɗakkotiri bee labbi ummaatooje lesdi man ɗe Allah nattinno yeeso maɓɓe.

source: And the God of Israel stirred up the spirit of Pul king of Assyria, and the spirit of Tilgath–pilneser king of Assyria, and he carried them away, even the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and the half tribe of Manasseh, and brought them unto Halah, and Habor, and Hara, and to the river Gozan, unto this day.
target: Ngam maajum Allah Isra'iila ummini ɓerɗe Pul e Tigilat-Pileser, laamiiɓe Assuura ngam dahugo  yimɓe Ruben e yimɓe Gada e reeta lenyol Manassa haa Halah e maayo Habor e Hara e maayo Goosan. Ton ɓe ngoni haa wargo hannde .

source: The sons of Levi; Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Lewi ngoni: Gersom e Kahat e Meraari.

source: And the sons of Kohath; Amram, Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
target: Ndaa inɗe ɓiɓɓe Gersom: Libni e Sim'i.

source: And the children of Amram; Aaron, and Moses, and Miriam. The sons also of Aaron; Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Kahat boo: Amram e Yicehar e Heburuun e Uzziyel.

source: Eleazar begat Phinehas, Phinehas begat Abishua,
target: Ɓiɓɓe Meraari boo: Mahali e Musi . Ndaa ci'e  Lewi'en fodde kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe:

source: And Abishua begat Bukki, and Bukki begat Uzzi,
target: Danygol Gersom: Gersom danyi Libni, Libni danyi Yahat, Yahat danyi Zimma,

source: And Uzzi begat Zerahiah, and Zerahiah begat Meraioth,
target: Zimma danyi Yo'aha, Yo'aha danyi Iddo, Iddo danyi Zeraha, Zeraha danyi Yatiray.

source: Meraioth begat Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,
target: Danygol Kahat boo: Kahat danyi Amminadabu, Amminadabu danyi Koora, Koora danyi Assir,

source: And Ahitub begat Zadok, and Zadok begat Ahimaaz,
target: Assir danyi Elkaana, Elkaana danyi Abiyasaf, Abiyasaf danyi Assir,

source: And Ahimaaz begat Azariah, and Azariah begat Johanan,
target: Assir danyi Tahat, Tahat danyi Uriyel, Uriyel danyi Uzziya, Uzziya danyi Sawulu.

source: And Johanan begat Azariah,
target: Ɓiɓɓe Elkaana ngoni: Amasay e Ahimot.

source: And Azariah begat Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,
target: Danygol Ahimot: Ahimot danyi Elkaana, Elkaana danyi Sofay, Sofay danyi Nahat,

source: And Ahitub begat Zadok, and Zadok begat Shallum,
target: Nahat danyi Eliyabu, Eliyabu danyi Yeroham, Yeroham danyi Elkaana, Elkaana danyi Samuyila.

source: And Shallum begat Hilkiah, and Hilkiah begat Azariah,
target: Ɓiɓɓe Samuyila boo: Yo'el woni afo maako, Abiya boo, ɗiɗaɓo.

source: And Azariah begat Seraiah, and Seraiah begat Jehozadak,
target: Danygol Meraari boo: Meraari danyi Mahali, Mahali danyi Libni, Libni danyi Sim'i, Sim'i danyi Uzza,

source: And Jehozadak went into captivity, when the  Lord  carried away Judah and Jerusalem by the hand of Nebuchadnezzar.
target: Uzza danyi Sim'a, Sim'a danyi Haggiya, Haggiya danyi Asaya.

source: The sons of Levi; Gershom, Kohath, and Merari.
target: Ndaa yimɓe ɓe Daawuda darni ngam ɗowugo gimi nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo ɓaawo ɓe njo'ini sundukru alkawal nder maaru.

source: And these be the names of the sons of Gershom; Libni, and Shimei.
target: Ɓe kuuwi kuugal man yeeso laymaaru fottirde bee yimugo haa saa'i Suleymaanu nyiɓi haykaliiru Jawmiraawo haa Urusaliima. Ɓe kuuwi kuugal maɓɓe fodde umroore nde ɓe umri ɓe.

source: And the sons of Kohath were, Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
target: Ndaa inɗe dariiɓe ton e ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe: Nder yimɓe Kahat, Heman gimoowo ɓii Yo'el, ɓii Samuyila,

source: The sons of Merari; Mahli, and Mushi. And these are the families of the Levites according to their fathers.
target: ɓii Elkaana, ɓii Yeroham, ɓii Eliyel, ɓii Tooha,

source: Of Gershom; Libni his son, Jahath his son, Zimmah his son,
target: ɓii Cuuf, ɓii Elkaana, ɓii Mahat, ɓii Amasay,

source: Joah his son, Iddo his son, Zerah his son, Jeaterai his son.
target: ɓii Elkaana, ɓii Yo'el, ɓii Azariya, ɓii Sefaniya,

source: The sons of Kohath; Amminadab his son, Korah his son, Assir his son,
target: ɓii Tahat, ɓii Asir, ɓii Ebiyasaf, ɓii Koora,

source: Elkanah his son, and Ebiasaph his son, and Assir his son,
target: ɓii Yicehar, ɓii Kahat, ɓii Lewi, ɓii Isra'iila.

source: Tahath his son, Uriel his son, Uzziah his son, and Shaul his son.
target: Non boo Asaf banndiiko, dariiɗo haa nyaamo maako: Asaf ɓii Berekiya, ɓii Sim'a,

source: And the sons of Elkanah; Amasai, and Ahimoth.
target: ɓii Mika'iilu, ɓii Ba'aseya, ɓii Malkiya,

source: As for Elkanah: the sons of Elkanah; Zophai his son, and Nahath his son,
target: ɓii Etani, ɓii Zeraha, ɓii Adaya,

source: Eliab his son, Jeroham his son, Elkanah his son.
target: ɓii Etan, ɓii Zimma, ɓii Sim'i,

source: And the sons of Samuel; the firstborn Vashni, and Abiah.
target: ɓii Yahat, ɓii Gersom, ɓii Lewi.

source: The sons of Merari; Mahli, Libni his son, Shimei his son, Uzza his son,
target: Nder yimɓe Meraari, banndiraaɓe maɓɓe dariiɓe haa wakeere nannde boo, Etan ɓii Kiisi, ɓii Abdi, ɓii Malluku,

source: Shimea his son, Haggiah his son, Asaiah his son.
target: ɓii Hasabiya, ɓii Amasiya, ɓii Hilkiyya,

source: And these are they whom David set over the service of song in the house of the  Lord , after that the ark had rest.
target: ɓii Amsi, ɓii Baani, ɓii Semer,

source: And they ministered before the dwelling place of the tabernacle of the congregation with singing, until Solomon had built the house of the  Lord  in Jerusalem: and then they waited on their office according to their order.
target: ɓii Mahali, ɓii Musi, ɓii Meraari, ɓii Lewi.

source: And these are they that waited with their children. Of the sons of the Kohathites: Heman a singer, the son of Joel, the son of Shemuel,
target: Banndiraaɓe maɓɓe Lewi'en kalfinaama kuuɗe fuu haa jooɗorde, waato haykaliiru Allah.

source: The son of Elkanah, the son of Jeroham, the son of Eliel, the son of Toah,
target: Haruna bee ɓikkoy mum ɗon ngula kirsaaɗi dow hirsirde e uurle dow gulduɗum uurle. Kamɓe ngoni suklaniiɓe kuuje ɓurɗe senaago, ngam haa ɓe keɓana Isra'iila'en yaafuye fodde umroore Muusa, jaggiiɗo Allah.

source: The son of Zuph, the son of Elkanah, the son of Mahath, the son of Amasai,
target: Ndaa danygol Haruna: Haruna danyi Eli'azaaru, Eli'azaaru danyi Pinehas, Pinehas danyi Abisu'a,

source: The son of Elkanah, the son of Joel, the son of Azariah, the son of Zephaniah,
target: Abisu'a danyi Bukki, Bukki danyi Uzzi, Uzzi danyi Zerahiya,

source: The son of Tahath, the son of Assir, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah,
target: Zerahiya danyi Merayot, Merayot danyi Amariya, Amariya danyi Ahitooba,

source: The son of Izhar, the son of Kohath, the son of Levi, the son of Israel.
target: Ahitooba danyi Cadok, Cadok danyi Ahimaas.

source: And his brother Asaph, who stood on his right hand, even Asaph the son of Berechiah, the son of Shimea,
target: Ndaa no Lewi'en njooɗori fodde beerle maɓɓe nder maral maɓɓe: Ɓiɓɓe Haruna nder danygol Kahat, bana kur'u aranu yeɗi ɓe.

source: The son of Michael, the son of Baaseiah, the son of Malchiah,
target: Ɓe keɓi berniwol Heburuun nder lesdi Yahuuda bee durduɗe maagol taariiɗe ngol.

source: The son of Ethni, the son of Zerah, the son of Adaiah,
target: Ammaa gese berniwol maajum bee gure maagol, ɓe ndokki ɗum Kaaleb ɓii Yefunna.

source: The son of Ethan, the son of Zimmah, the son of Shimei,
target: Ɓe ndokki ɓiɓɓe Haruna boo berniiji kisruɗi ɗi'i: Heburuun e Libna bee durduɗe maagol e Yattir e Estemo'a bee durduɗe maagol

source: The son of Jahath, the son of Gershom, the son of Levi.
target: e Hiles bee durduɗe maagol e Debir bee durduɗe maagol

source: And their brethren the sons of Merari stood on the left hand: Ethan the son of Kishi, the son of Abdi, the son of Malluch,
target: e Asan bee durduɗe maagol e Bayti-Semes bee durduɗe maagol.

source: The son of Hashabiah, the son of Amaziah, the son of Hilkiah,
target: Haa lenyol Benyamin boo: Geba bee durduɗe maagol e Alemet bee durduɗe maagol e Anatot bee durduɗe maagol. Berniiji maɓɓe fuu, ɗi sappo e tati, fodde ci'e maɓɓe.

source: The son of Amzi, the son of Bani, the son of Shamer,
target: Danygol Kahat luttuŋgol heɓi berniiji sappo bee kur'u nder lenyol Efrayim e lenyol Dan e reeta lenyol Manassa.

source: The son of Mahli, the son of Mushi, the son of Merari, the son of Levi.
target: Ci'e nder danygol Gersom keɓi berniiji sappo e tati bee kur'u, nder lenyol Issakar e lenyol Aser e lenyol Neftali e lenyol Manassa nder Baasan.

source: Their brethren also the Levites were appointed unto all manner of service of the tabernacle of the house of God.
target: Ci'e nder danygol Meraari keɓi berniiji sappo e ɗiɗi bee kur'u, nder lenyol Ruben e lenyol Gada e lenyol Zabulon.

source: But Aaron and his sons offered upon the altar of the burnt offering, and on the altar of incense, and were appointed for all the work of the place most holy, and to make an atonement for Israel, according to all that Moses the servant of God had commanded.
target: Bana nii Isra'iila'en ndokkiri Lewi'en berniiji ɗi bee durduɗe maaji.

source: And these are the sons of Aaron; Eleazar his son, Phinehas his son, Abishua his son,
target: Ɓe ta'i ɗum bee kur'u nder lenyol yimɓe Yahuuda e lenyol yimɓe Simeyon e lenyol yimɓe Benyamin, berniiji ɗi'i inndinaaɗi bee inɗe maɓɓe.

source: Bukki his son, Uzzi his son, Zerahiah his son,
target: Ci'e nder danygol Kahat goɗɗe nastini berniiji maral maaje nder lenyol Efrayim.

source: Meraioth his son, Amariah his son, Ahitub his son,
target: Ɓe ndokki ɓe berniiji kisruɗi ɗi'i: Sikem bee durduɗe maagol nder lesdi kooseeje Efrayim e Gezer bee durduɗe maagol

source: Zadok his son, Ahimaaz his son.
target: e Yokme'am bee durduɗe maagol e Baytihurun bee durduɗe maagol

source: Now these are their dwelling places throughout their castles in their coasts, of the sons of Aaron, of the families of the Kohathites: for theirs was the lot.
target: e Ayyalon bee durduɗe maagol e Gat-Rimmon bee durduɗe maagol

source: And they gave them Hebron in the land of Judah, and the suburbs thereof round about it.
target: nder reeta lenyol Manassa boo: Aner bee durduɗe maagol e Bile'am bee durduɗe maagol. Kanji laatani danygol ɓiɓɓe Kahat luttuɓe.

source: But the fields of the city, and the villages thereof, they gave to Caleb the son of Jephunneh.
target: Danygol Gersom heɓi berniiji ɗi'i nder yimɓe reeta lenyol Manassa: Golan nder Baasan bee durduɗe maagol e Astarot bee durduɗe maagol.

source: And to the sons of Aaron they gave the cities of Judah, namely, Hebron, the city of refuge, and Libnah with her suburbs, and Jattir, and Eshtemoa, with their suburbs,
target: Nder lenyol Issakar boo: Keedes bee durduɗe maagol e Daberat bee durduɗe maagol

source: And Hilen with her suburbs, Debir with her suburbs,
target: e Ramot bee durduɗe maagol e Anem bee durduɗe maagol.

source: And Ashan with her suburbs, and Beth–shemesh with her suburbs:
target: Nder lenyol Aser boo: Masal bee durduɗe maagol e Abdon bee durduɗe maagol

source: And out of the tribe of Benjamin; Geba with her suburbs, and Alemeth with her suburbs, and Anathoth with her suburbs. All their cities throughout their families were thirteen cities.
target: e Hukok bee durduɗe maagol e Rehob bee durduɗe maagol.

source: And unto the sons of Kohath, which were left of the family of that tribe, were cities given out of the half tribe, namely, out of the half tribe of Manasseh, by lot, ten cities.
target: Nder lenyol Neftali boo: Keedes nder Galiili bee durduɗe maagol e Hammon bee durduɗe maagol e Kiriyatayim bee durduɗe maagol.

source: And to the sons of Gershom throughout their families out of the tribe of Issachar, and out of the tribe of Asher, and out of the tribe of Naphtali, and out of the tribe of Manasseh in Bashan, thirteen cities.
target: Danygol Meraari luttuŋgol heɓi berniiji ɗi'i nder lenyol Zabulon: Rimmono bee durduɗe maagol e Taboora bee durduɗe maagol.

source: Unto the sons of Merari were given by lot, throughout their families, out of the tribe of Reuben, and out of the tribe of Gad, and out of the tribe of Zebulun, twelve cities.
target: Haa gaɗa Urdun, wakeere fuunaaŋge haa tiitotirde Yeriko, ngol heɓi haa lenyol Ruben: Beser nder ladde bee durduɗe maagol e Yahas bee durduɗe maagol

source: And the children of Israel gave to the Levites these cities with their suburbs.
target: e Kedemot bee durduɗe maagol e Mefa'at bee durduɗe maagol.

source: And they gave by lot out of the tribe of the children of Judah, and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon, and out of the tribe of the children of Benjamin, these cities, which are called by their names.
target: Nder lenyol Gada boo: Ramot nder Gile'at bee durduɗe maagol e Mahanayim bee durduɗe maagol

source: And the residue of the families of the sons of Kohath had cities of their coasts out of the tribe of Ephraim.
target: e Hesbon bee durduɗe maagol e Ya'ajer bee durduɗe maagol.

source: Now the sons of Issachar were, Tola, and Puah, Jashub, and Shimron, four.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Issakar ngoni: Tola e Puwa e Yasuba e Simron, ɓe nayo.

source: And the sons of Tola; Uzzi, and Rephaiah, and Jeriel, and Jahmai, and Jibsam, and Shemuel, heads of their father's house, to wit, of Tola: they were valiant men of might in their generations; whose number was in the days of David two and twenty thousand and six hundred.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Tola boo: Uzzi e Refaya e Yeriyel e Yahamay e Yipsam e Samuyila. Kamɓe ngoni baaba-ci'e'en nder danygol Tola, ɓe honooɓe semmbiɗɓe, suusɓe fodde gide maɓɓe. Limgal maɓɓe zamanu laamu Daawuda, ujine noogas e ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe njoweego .

source: And the sons of Uzzi; Izrahiah: and the sons of Izrahiah; Michael, and Obadiah, and Joel, Ishiah, five: all of them chief men.
target: Ɓii Uzzi, Yisrahiya. Ɓiɓɓe Yisrahiya boo: Mika'iilu e Obadiya e Yo'el e Yissiya, hawti mawɓe njowo.

source: And with them, by their generations, after the house of their fathers, were bands of soldiers for war, six and thirty thousand men: for they had many wives and sons.
target: Mooɓe jama'aare konu ujine cappanɗe tato e njoweego  ngondi bee maɓɓe, fodde gide maɓɓe e ci'e maɓɓe, ngam ɓe ngoodi rewɓe e ɓiɓɓe ɗuuɗɓe.

source: And their brethren among all the families of Issachar were valiant men of might, reckoned in all by their genealogies fourscore and seven thousand.
target: Banndiraaɓe maɓɓe nder ci'e Issakar'en fuu, limgal winndaaɓe nder deftere asli waɗi honooɓe semmbiɗɓe ujine cappanɗe njoweetato e njoweeɗiɗo .

source: The sons of Benjamin; Bela, and Becher, and Jediael, three.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Benyamin ngoni: Bela e Beker e Yedi'ayel, ɓe tato.

source: And the sons of Bela; Ezbon, and Uzzi, and Uzziel, and Jerimoth, and Iri, five; heads of the house of their fathers, mighty men of valour; and were reckoned by their genealogies twenty and two thousand and thirty and four.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Bela boo: Esbon e Uzzi e Uzziyel e Yerimot e Iiri, ɓe njowo. Ɓe baaba-ci'e'en, honooɓe semmbiɗɓe. Limgal winndaaɓe maɓɓe waɗi ujine noogas e ɗiɗo e cappanɗe tato e nayo .

source: And the sons of Becher; Zemira, and Joash, and Eliezer, and Elioenai, and Omri, and Jerimoth, and Abiah, and Anathoth, and Alameth. All these are the sons of Becher.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Beker boo: Zimira e Yo'as e Eli'ezer e Eliyo'enay e Omri e Yeremot e Abiya e Anatot e Alemet, ɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Beker.

source: And the number of them, after their genealogy by their generations, heads of the house of their fathers, mighty men of valour, was twenty thousand and two hundred.
target: Winndaaɓe nder deftere asli maɓɓe fodde baaba-ci'e'en maɓɓe, honooɓe semmbiɗɓe ujine noogas e teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo .

source: The sons also of Jediael; Bilhan: and the sons of Bilhan; Jeush, and Benjamin, and Ehud, and Chenaanah, and Zethan, and Tharshish, and Ahishahar.
target: Ɓii Yedi'ayel, Bilhan. Ɓiɓɓe Bilhan boo: Ye'us e Benyamin e Ehuudi e Kenana e Zetan e Tarsis e Ahisahar.

source: All these the sons of Jediael, by the heads of their fathers, mighty men of valour, were seventeen thousand and two hundred soldiers, fit to go out for war and battle.
target: Ɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Yedi'ayel, fodde baaba-ci'e'en, honooɓe semmbiɗɓe, waawɓe konu ujine sappo e njoweeɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo .

source: Shuppim also, and Huppim, the children of Ir, and Hushim, the sons of Aher.
target: Suppim e Huppim ngoni ɓiɓɓe Iir, Husim woni ɓii Aher.

source: The sons of Naphtali; Jahziel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shallum, the sons of Bilhah.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Neftali ngoni: Yahaciyel e Guni e Yejer e Sallum. Kamɓe ngoni danygol Bilha .

source: The sons of Manasseh; Asriel, whom she bare: (but his concubine the Aramitess bare Machir the father of Gilead:
target: Ɓiɓɓe Manassa ngoni: Asriyel mo culaaɗo Manassa Siriyaajo danyi. O danyi boo Makir, baaba Gile'at.

source: And Machir took to wife the sister of Huppim and Shuppim, whose sister's name was Maachah;) and the name of the second was Zelophehad: and Zelophehad had daughters.
target: Makir te'ani Huppim e Suppim rewɓe. Innde deerɗiiko debbo, Ma'aka, innde ɓiyiiko ɗiɗaɓo, Celofhad. Kaŋko o walaa ɓiɓɓe worɓe, sey ɓiɓɓe rewɓe.

source: And Maachah the wife of Machir bare a son, and she called his name Peresh; and the name of his brother was Sheresh; and his sons were Ulam and Rakem.
target: Ma'aka, debbo Makir danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko, inndi mo Peres. Innde deerɗiiko, Zeres. Ɓiɓɓe Zeres boo: Ulam e Rekem.

source: And the sons of Ulam; Bedan. These were the sons of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh.
target: Ɓii Ulam boo, Bedan. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Gile'at ɓii Makir ɓii Manassa.

source: And his sister Hammoleketh bare Ishod, and Abiezer, and Mahalah.
target: Hammoleket, deerɗu Gile'at debbo danyi Isihoda e Abi'ezer e Mahala.

source: And the sons of Shemida were, Ahian, and Shechem, and Likhi, and Aniam.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Semida boo: Ahiyan e Sikem e Likhi e Ani'am.

source: And the sons of Ephraim; Shuthelah, and Bered his son, and Tahath his son, and Eladah his son, and Tahath his son,
target: Ndaa danygol Efrayim: Efrayim danyi Sutelaha, Sutelaha danyi Beeret, Beeret danyi Tahat, Tahat danyi El'aada, El'aada danyi Tahat,

source: And Zabad his son, and Shuthelah his son, and Ezer, and Elead, whom the men of Gath that were born in that land slew, because they came down to take away their cattle.
target: Tahat danyi Zabada, Zabada danyi Sutelaha. Non boo Ezer e El'aadi ɓe yimɓe Gaat danyaaɓe nder lesdi maajum mbari, ngam ɓe njahno jaɓtugo tokke maɓɓe.

source: And Ephraim their father mourned many days, and his brethren came to comfort him.
target: Baaba maɓɓe Efrayim woyi ɓe nyalɗe ɗuuɗɗe, deerɗiraaɓe maako ngari de'itingo mo.

source: And when he went in to his wife, she conceived, and bare a son, and he called his name Beriah, because it went evil with his house.
target: Nden o hawti bee debbo maako, kaŋko o reedi, o danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko. Efrayim inndi mo Beri'a ngam sarru ɗon haa saare maako.
O woodi boo ɓiɗɗo debbo. Innde maako Se'era mo nyiɓi Baytihurun-les e Baytihurun-dow e Uzzen-Se'era.

source: And Rephah was his son, also Resheph, and Telah his son, and Tahan his son,
target: Beri'a danyi Refaha, Refaha danyi Resef, Resef danyi Telaha, Telaha danyi Tahan,

source: Laadan his son, Ammihud his son, Elishama his son,
target: Tahan danyi La'adan, La'adan danyi Ammihudu, Ammihudu danyi Eliisama,

source: Non his son, Jehoshua his son.
target: Eliisama danyi Nuuna, Nuuna danyi Yosuwa.

source: And their possessions and habitations were, Beth–el and the towns thereof, and eastward Naaran, and westward Gezer, with the towns thereof; Shechem also and the towns thereof, unto Gaza and the towns thereof:
target: Ɓe njooɗi haa berniwol Baytila bee gure maagol e Na'ara haa fuunaaŋge Gezer bee gure maagol haa hiirnaaŋge e Sikem bee gure maagol, haa yotti Ayya bee gure maagol. Ɗum laati maral maɓɓe.

source: And by the borders of the children of Manasseh, Beth–shean and her towns, Taanach and her towns, Megiddo and her towns, Dor and her towns. In these dwelt the children of Joseph the son of Israel.
target: Ammaa ɓiɓɓe Manassa mari Bayti-Se'an bee gure maagol e Ta'enak bee gure maagol e Megiddo bee gure maagol e Door bee gure maagol. Nder maaji fuu danygol Yusufu ɓii Isra'iila njooɗi.

source: The sons of Asher; Imnah, and Ishuah, and Ishvi, and Beriah, and Serah their sister.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Aser ngoni: Yimna e Yisuwa e Yisuwi e Beri'a e Seraha, deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo.

source: And the sons of Beriah; Heber, and Malchiel, who is the father of Birzavith.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Beri'a boo: Heber e Malkiyel, baaba Birzawit.

source: And Heber begat Japhlet, and Shomer, and Hotham, and Shua their sister.
target: Heber danyi Yaflet e Somer e Hotam e Su'a, deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo.

source: And the sons of Japhlet; Pasach, and Bimhal, and Ashvath. These are the children of Japhlet.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Yaflet boo: Pasak e Bimahal e Asuwat, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Yaflet.

source: And the sons of Shamer; Ahi, and Rohgah, Jehubbah, and Aram.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Somer boo: Ahi e Rohaga e Huba e Siriya.

source: And the sons of his brother Helem; Zophah, and Imna, and Shelesh, and Amal.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Helem, deerɗiraawo Somer ngoni: Sofaha e Yimna e Seles e Amal.

source: The sons of Zophah; Suah, and Harnepher, and Shual, and Beri, and Imrah,
target: Ɓiɓɓe Sofaha boo: Suuha e Harnefer e Su'al e Beeri e Yimra

source: Bezer, and Hod, and Shamma, and Shilshah, and Ithran, and Beera.
target: e Beser e Hoodi e Samma e Silsa e Yitiran e Beera.

source: And the sons of Jether; Jephunneh, and Pispah, and Ara.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Yeter boo: Yefunna e Pispa e Ara.

source: And the sons of Ulla; Arah, and Haniel, and Rezia.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Ulla boo: Araha e Hanniyel e Risiya.

source: All these were the children of Asher, heads of their father's house, choice and mighty men of valour, chief of the princes. And the number throughout the genealogy of them that were apt to the war and to battle was twenty and six thousand men.
target: Ɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Aser, baaba-ci'e'en suɓaaɓe, ardiiɓe mawɓe, honooɓe semmbiɗɓe. Limgal winndaaɓe maɓɓe nder jama'aare konu waɗi ujine noogas e njoweego .

source: Now Benjamin begat Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,
target: Benyamin danyi Bela, afo maako, Asbeel ɗiɗaɓo, Aharaha tataɓo,

source: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.
target: Noha nayaɓo e Rafa njowaɓo.

source: And the sons of Bela were, Addar, and Gera, and Abihud,
target: Bela boo woodi ɓiɓɓe: Addar e Geera e Abihuda

source: And Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,
target: e Abisu'a e Na'aman e Ahoha

source: And Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.
target: e Geera e Sefufan e Huuram.

source: And these are the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Geba, and they removed them to Manahath:
target: Ndaa ɓiɓɓe Ehuudi baaba-ci'e'en caka jooɗiiɓe haa Geba, dahaaɓe haa Manahat:

source: And Naaman, and Ahiah, and Gera, he removed them, and begat Uzza, and Ahihud.
target: Na'aman e Ahiya e Geera, kaŋko dahi ɓe. O danyi Uzza e Ahihuda.

source: And Shaharaim begat children in the country of Moab, after he had sent them away; Hushim and Baara were his wives.
target: Saharayim danyi ɓiɓɓe haa lesdi Mo'ab, ɓaawo o riiwi rewɓe maako Husim e Ba'ara.

source: And he begat of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,
target: Hodes, debbo maako danyani mo Yobaba e Cibiya e Meesa e Malkam

source: And Jeuz, and Shachia, and Mirma. These were his sons, heads of the fathers.
target: e Ye'us e Sakiya e Mirma. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe maako, baaba-ci'e'en.

source: And of Hushim he begat Abitub, and Elpaal.
target: Ammaa bee Husim o danydi Abituba e Elpa'al.

source: The sons of Elpaal; Eber, and Misham, and Shamed, who built Ono, and Lod, with the towns thereof:
target: Ɓiɓɓe Elpa'al boo: Eber e Mise'am e Semed mo nyiɓi Oono e Lodo bee gure maagol.

source: Beriah also, and Shema, who were heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove away the inhabitants of Gath:
target: Beri'a e Sema ngoni baaba-ci'e'en, jooɗiiɓe haa Ayyalon, ɓe ndiiwi yimɓe Gaat.

source: And Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,
target: Ahiyo e Sasak e Yeremot

source: And Zebadiah, and Arad, and Ader,
target: e Zebadiya e Arat e Eder

source: And Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah;
target: e Mika'iilu e Yispa e Yoha, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Beri'a.

source: And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,
target: Zebadiya e Mesullam e Hijiki e Heber

source: Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;
target: e Yismeray e Yisliya e Yobaba, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Elpa'al.

source: And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,
target: Yakim e Zikiri e Zabdi

source: And Elienai, and Zilthai, and Eliel,
target: e Eli'enay e Cillitay e Eliyel

source: And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi;
target: e Adaya e Beraya e Simirat, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Sim'i.

source: And Ishpan, and Heber, and Eliel,
target: Yispan e Eber e Eliyel

source: And Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,
target: e Abdon e Zikiri e Hanan

source: And Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,
target: e Hananiya e Elam e Antotiya

source: And Iphedeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak;
target: e Yifdiya e Penuwel, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Sasak.

source: And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,
target: Samseray e Sehariya e Ataliya

source: And Jaresiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.
target: e Ya'arsiya e Eliya e Zikiri, kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Yeroham.

source: These were heads of the fathers, by their generations, chief men. These dwelt in Jerusalem.
target: Ɓe'e fuu ngoni baaba-ci'e'en fodde deftere asli maɓɓe, ɓe njooɗi haa Urusaliima.

source: And at Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon; whose wife's name was Maachah:
target: Baaba Gibiyon jooɗi haa Gibiyon. Innde debbo maako, Ma'aka.

source: And his firstborn son Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,
target: Abdon woni afo maako, nden o danyi boo Cuuru e Kis e Ba'al e Nadab

source: And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zacher.
target: e Gedor e Ahiyo e Zeker.

source: And Mikloth begat Shimeah. And these also dwelt with their brethren in Jerusalem, over against them.
target: Mikilot danyi Sim'a. Kamɓe ɓe njooɗodi banndiraaɓe maɓɓe haa Urusaliima, ɓe tiitotiri.

source: And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchi–shua, and Abinadab, and Esh–baal.
target: Neer danyi Kis, Kis danyi Sawulu, Sawulu danyi Yonatan e Malkisu'a e Abinadabu e Esba'al.

source: And the son of Jonathan was Merib–baal; and Merib–baal begat Micah.
target: Ɓii Yonatan boo: Merib-Ba'al. Merib-Ba'al danyi Mika.

source: And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Mika boo: Piton e Melek e Tahare'a e Akas.

source: And Ahaz begat Jehoadah; and Jehoadah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza,
target: Akas danyi Yeho'adda, Yeho'adda danyi Alemet e Azmawet e Zimiri. Zimiri danyi Moosa,

source: And Moza begat Binea: Rapha was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son:
target: Moosa danyi Bine'a, Bine'a danyi Rafa, Rafa danyi El'aasa, El'aasa danyi Acel.

source: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these, Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.
target: Acel woodi ɓiɓɓe worɓe njoweego. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe: Azrikam e Bokuru e Isma'iilu e Se'ariya e Obadiya e Hanan. Ɓe fuu ɓe ɓiɓɓe Acel.

source: And the sons of Eshek his brother were, Ulam his firstborn, Jehush the second, and Eliphelet the third.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Esek, deerɗiiko ngoni: Ulam afo maako, Ye'us ɗiɗaɓo e Elifelet tataɓo.

source: And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valour, archers, and had many sons, and sons' sons, an hundred and fifty. All these are of the sons of Benjamin.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Ulam fuu ɓe honooɓe semmbiɗɓe, tirooɓe lagaaje. Ɓe ngoodi ɓiɓɓe e taaniraaɓe ɗuuɗɓe, limgal maɓɓe waɗi yimɓe teemerre e cappanɗe njowo . Ɓe fuu maɓɓe ɓe ɗon nder danygol Benyamin.

source: So all Israel were reckoned by genealogies; and, behold, they were written in the book of the kings of Israel and Judah, who were carried away to Babylon for their transgression.
target: Bana nii Isra'iila'en fuu mbinndaama fodde gide muuɗum'en nder Deftere Laamiiɓe Isra'iila. Ammaa yimɓe Yahuuda dahaama haa Baabila ngam ɓe ngewi umroore Jawmiraawo.

source: Now the first inhabitants that dwelt in their possessions in their cities were, the Israelites, the priests, Levites, and the Nethinims.
target: Aartuɓe wartugo haa ɓe njooɗo nder maral maɓɓe e nder gure maɓɓe, ɗum Isra'iila'en woɗɓe e liman'en e Lewi'en e huuwooɓe kuuɗe pamare nder haykaliiru.

source: And in Jerusalem dwelt of the children of Judah, and of the children of Benjamin, and of the children of Ephraim, and Manasseh;
target: Yimɓe Yahuuda e Benyamin e Efrayim e Manassa woɗɓe boo njooɗi haa Urusaliima .

source: Uthai the son of Ammihud, the son of Omri, the son of Imri, the son of Bani, of the children of Pharez the son of Judah.
target: Nder yimɓe Yahuuda: Utay ɓii Ammihudu ɓii Omiri ɓii Imiri ɓii Baani, nder danygol Peres ɓii Yahuuda

source: And of the Shilonites; Asaiah the firstborn, and his sons.
target: e nder Selani'en boo: Asaya, afo Selan e ɓiɓɓe maako.

source: And of the sons of Zerah; Jeuel, and their brethren, six hundred and ninety.
target: Nder ɓiɓɓe Zeraha boo: Ye'uwel e banndiraaɓe maɓɓe teemeɗɗe njoweego e cappanɗe njoweenayo .

source: And of the sons of Benjamin; Sallu the son of Meshullam, the son of Hodaviah, the son of Hasenuah,
target: Nder yimɓe Benyamin boo: Sallu ɓii Mesullam ɓii Hodawiya ɓii Hassenuwa

source: And Ibneiah the son of Jeroham, and Elah the son of Uzzi, the son of Michri, and Meshullam the son of Shephathiah, the son of Reuel, the son of Ibnijah;
target: e Yibniya ɓii Yeroham e Ela ɓii Uzzi ɓii Mikiri e Mesullam ɓii Sefatiya ɓii Re'uwel ɓii Yibniya.

source: And their brethren, according to their generations, nine hundred and fifty and six. All these men were chief of the fathers in the house of their fathers.
target: Limgal banndiraaɓe maɓɓe fodde defte asli maɓɓe, waɗi yimɓe teemeɗɗe njoweenayo e cappanɗe njowo e njoweego . Ɓe fuu ɓe baaba-ci'e'en maɓɓe.

source: And of the priests; Jedaiah, and Jehoiarib, and Jachin,
target: Nder liman'en: Yeda'ya e Yoyaribu e Yakin

source: And Azariah the son of Hilkiah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Zadok, the son of Meraioth, the son of Ahitub, the ruler of the house of God;
target: e Azariya ɓii Hilkiyya ɓii Mesullam ɓii Cadok ɓii Merayot ɓii Ahitooba, kaliifaajo haykaliiru Allah.

source: And Adaiah the son of Jeroham, the son of Pashur, the son of Malchijah, and Maasiai the son of Adiel, the son of Jahzerah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Meshillemith, the son of Immer;
target: Non boo Adaya ɓii Yeroham ɓii Pashuuru ɓii Malkiya e Ma'asay ɓii Adiyel ɓii Yahasera ɓii Mesullam ɓii Mesillemit ɓii Immer

source: And their brethren, heads of the house of their fathers, a thousand and seven hundred and threescore; very able men for the work of the service of the house of God.
target: e banndiraaɓe maɓɓe, baaba-ci'e'en ujineere e teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo e cappanɗe njoweego , ɓe worɓe waawɓe kuugal haa haykaliiru Allah.

source: And of the Levites; Shemaiah the son of Hasshub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, of the sons of Merari;
target: Nder Lewi'en Sema'ya ɓii Hassuba ɓii Azrikam ɓii Hasabiya mo danygol Meraari

source: And Bakbakkar, Heresh, and Galal, and Mattaniah the son of Mica, the son of Zichri, the son of Asaph;
target: e Bakbakkar e Heeres e Galal e Mattaniya ɓii Mika ɓii Zikiri ɓii Asaf

source: And Obadiah the son of Shemaiah, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun, and Berechiah the son of Asa, the son of Elkanah, that dwelt in the villages of the Netophathites.
target: e Obadiya ɓii Sema'ya ɓii Galal ɓii Yedutuun e Berekiya ɓii Asa ɓii Elkaana, mo jooɗi nder gure Netofa'en.

source: And the porters were, Shallum, and Akkub, and Talmon, and Ahiman, and their brethren: Shallum was the chief;
target: Ɓe'e ngoni aynooɓe dammuɗe: Sallum e Akkubu e Talmon e Ahiman e banndiraaɓe maɓɓe. Sallum woni hooreejo maɓɓe.

source: Who hitherto waited in the king's gate eastward: they were porters in the companies of the children of Levi.
target: Haa wargo hannde ɓe ɗon ayna Dammugal Laamiiɗo haa wakeere suudu fuunaaŋgeere. Kamɓe ngoni aynooɓe dammuɗe saŋngeere Lewi'en.

source: And Shallum the son of Kore, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah, and his brethren, of the house of his father, the Korahites, were over the work of the service, keepers of the gates of the tabernacle: and their fathers, being over the host of the  Lord , were keepers of the entry.
target: Sallum ɓii Koore ɓii Ebiyasaf ɓii Koora e deerɗiraaɓe maako iwɓe haa saare baaba maako, waato Koora'en, kamɓe ɓe keɓi kuugal aynugo dammugal laymaaru, bana kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe aynirno nastirde haa saŋngeere Jawmiraawo.

source: And Phinehas the son of Eleazar was the ruler over them in time past, and the  Lord  was with him.
target: Ɓooyma Pinehas ɓii Eli'azaaru wonno hooreejo maɓɓe, ngam Jawmiraawo ɗonno wondi bee maako.

source: And Zechariah the son of Meshelemiah was porter of the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
target: Zekariya ɓii Meselemiya wonno aynoowo haa dammugal laymaaru fottirde.

source: All these which were chosen to be porters in the gates were two hundred and twelve. These were reckoned by their genealogy in their villages, whom David and Samuel the seer did ordain in their set office.
target: Suɓaaɓe ngam aynugo dammuɗe, limgal maɓɓe waɗi teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo e sappo e ɗiɗo . Ɓe winndaaɓe nder deftere asli maɓɓe haa gure maɓɓe. Daawuda e Samuyila gi'oowo kalfitini ɓe kuugal maajum.

source: So they and their children had the oversight of the gates of the house of the  Lord , namely, the house of the tabernacle, by wards.
target: Kamɓe e ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe ndari ngam aynol haa dammuɗe haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, waato suudu laymaaru.

source: In four quarters were the porters, toward the east, west, north, and south.
target: Aynooɓe dammuɗe go ndari haa alkibilaaji nayi fuu, haa fuunaaŋge e hiirnaaŋge e woyla e fombina.

source: And their brethren, which were in their villages, were to come after seven days from time to time with them.
target: Banndiraaɓe maɓɓe wonɓe nder gure boo, doole ɓe ngara saa'i feere feere ngam huuwdugo bee maɓɓe nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi.

source: For these Levites, the four chief porters, were in their set office, and were over the chambers and treasuries of the house of God.
target: Aynooɓe nayo mawɓe go ɗon kuuwa kuugal muuɗum'en foroy. Lewi'en ayni cigorɗi e ndesaaje haa suudu Allah.

source: And they lodged round about the house of God, because the charge was upon them, and the opening thereof every morning pertained to them.
target: Koo bee jemma boo ɓe ɗon baŋnge haykaliiru nder taarde fuu, ngam ɓe halfinaaɓe aynol. Nde weeti fuu ɓe maɓɓiti dammuɗe boo.

source: And certain of them had the charge of the ministering vessels, that they should bring them in and out by tale.
target: Lewi'en woɗɓe ɗon ngam aynugo kuuwruɗe. Ɓe limi ɗe, wakkati ɗe nastina malla ɗe ngurtina.

source: Some of them also were appointed to oversee the vessels, and all the instruments of the sanctuary, and the fine flour, and the wine, and the oil, and the frankincense, and the spices.
target: Woɗɓe fahin ɗon ngam aynugo kuuje goɗɗe e kuuje cenaaɗe fuu e kuroori ɗiggundi e inaboojam e nebbam e uurle uureteeɗe e kuuje uurɗe.

source: And some of the sons of the priests made the ointment of the spices.
target: Ammaa woɗɓe haa ɓiɓɓe liman'en njilli kuuje uurɗe man.

source: And Mattithiah, one of the Levites, who was the firstborn of Shallum the Korahite, had the set office over the things that were made in the pans.
target: Matitiya Lewiijo halfinaama kuugal sa'ugo  tamseeje. O afo Sallum Kooraajo.

source: And other of their brethren, of the sons of the Kohathites, were over the shewbread, to prepare it every sabbath.
target: Woɗɓe haa banndiraaɓe maɓɓe nder yimɓe Kahat kalfinaama kuugal tamseeje jo'inteeɗe, ɓe taaskitina ɗum nyalɗe ciwtorɗe fuu.

source: And these are the singers, chief of the fathers of the Levites, who remaining in the chambers were free: for they were employed in that work day and night.
target: Ammaa ɗowooɓe gimi, baaba-ci'e'en Lewi'en, njooɗi nder cuuɗi pamari haa haykaliiru Allah. Kamɓe ɓe kuuwaay kuugal feere, ngam ɓe ɗon cukli bee kuugal maɓɓe jemma e naaŋge fuu.

source: These chief fathers of the Levites were chief throughout their generations; these dwelt at Jerusalem.
target: Kamɓe ngoni baaba-ci'e'en Lewi'en fodde deftere asli maɓɓe. Ɓe njooɗi haa Urusaliima.

source: And in Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon, Jehiel, whose wife's name was Maachah:
target: Ye'iyel, baaba Gibiyon jooɗi haa Gibiyon. Innde debbo maako, Ma'aka.

source: And his firstborn son Abdon, then Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Ner, and Nadab,
target: Abdon woni afo maako, nden o danyi boo Cuuru e Kis e Ba'al e Neer e Nadab

source: And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zechariah, and Mikloth.
target: e Gedor e Ahiyo e Zekariya e Mikilot.

source: And Mikloth begat Shimeam. And they also dwelt with their brethren at Jerusalem, over against their brethren.
target: Mikilot danyi Simam. Kamɓe ɓe njooɗodi bee banndiraaɓe maɓɓe haa Urusaliima, ɓe tiitotiri.

source: And Ner begat Kish; and Kish begat Saul; and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchi–shua, and Abinadab, and Esh–baal.
target: Neer danyi Kis, Kis danyi Sawulu, Sawulu danyi Yonatan e Malkisu'a e Abinadabu e Esba'al.

source: And the son of Jonathan was Merib–baal: and Merib–baal begat Micah.
target: Ɓii Yonatan boo, Merib-Ba'al. Merib-Ba'al danyi Mika.

source: And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tahrea, and Ahaz.
target: Ɓiɓɓe Mika boo: Piton e Melek e Tahare'a.

source: And Ahaz begat Jarah; and Jarah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza;
target: Akas danyi Ya'ara, Ya'ara danyi Alemet e Azmawet e Zimiri. Zimiri danyi Moosa.

source: And Moza begat Binea; and Rephaiah his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.
target: Moosa danyi Bine'a, Bine'a danyi Refaya, Refaya danyi El'aasa, El'aasa danyi Acel.

source: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these, Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan: these were the sons of Azel.
target: Acel woodi ɓiɓɓe worɓe njoweego. Inɗe maɓɓe, Azrikam e Bokuru e Isma'iilu e Se'ariya e Obadiya e Hanan. Kamɓe ngoni ɓiɓɓe Acel.

source: Now the Philistines fought against Israel; and the men of Israel fled from before the Philistines, and fell down slain in mount Gilboa.
target: Nyannde feere, Filisti'en kaɓi bee Isra'iila'en haa hooseere Gilbo'a. Isra'iila'en ɗuuɗɓe mbaraama ton, luttuɓe boo ndoggi.

source: And the Philistines followed hard after Saul, and after his sons; and the Philistines slew Jonathan, and Abinadab, and Malchi–shua, the sons of Saul.
target: Filisti'en taasni Sawulu e ɓiɓɓe mum. Ɓe mbari Yonatan e Abinadabu e Malkisu'a, ɓiɓɓe Sawulu.

source: And the battle went sore against Saul, and the archers hit him, and he was wounded of the archers.
target: Haɓre saati dow Sawulu. Nde fiɗooɓe kuri keɓti mo, o hultori.

source: Then said Saul to his armourbearer, Draw thy sword, and thrust me through therewith; lest these uncircumcised come and abuse me. But his armourbearer would not; for he was sore afraid. So Saul took a sword, and fell upon it.
target: Sawulu wi'i doondoowo balmi mum: “Los kaafahi ma, yuwam, ngam taa saadooni'en ɓe'e ngara, pijirammi.” Ammaa doondoowo balmi maako sali, ngam o huli masin. Ngam maajum Sawulu hoo'i kaafahi mum, do'i dow maaki.

source: And when his armourbearer saw that Saul was dead, he fell likewise on the sword, and died.
target: Nde doondoowo balmi yi'i Sawulu maayi, kaŋko boo o losi kaafahi maako, o do'i dow maaki, o maayi.

source: So Saul died, and his three sons, and all his house died together.
target: Bana nii Sawulu e ɓiɓɓe mum tato e yimɓe saare mum fuu maaydi.

source: And when all the men of Israel that were in the valley saw that they fled, and that Saul and his sons were dead, then they forsook their cities, and fled: and the Philistines came and dwelt in them.
target: Nde Isra'iila'en wonɓe nder waadiwol fuu ngi'i jama'aare konu Isra'iila doggi, Sawulu e ɓiɓɓe mum boo maayi, ɓe acci berniiji maɓɓe, ɓe ndoggi kamɓe boo. Filisti'en ngari, njooɗi ton.

source: And it came to pass on the morrow, when the Philistines came to strip the slain, that they found Saul and his sons fallen in mount Gilboa.
target: Jaŋngo maajum Filisti'en ngari ngam ɓoftugo kuuje mbaraaɓe. Ɓe tawi Sawulu e ɓiɓɓe mum ɗon mbaali dow hooseere Gilbo'a.

source: And when they had stripped him, they took his head, and his armour, and sent into the land of the Philistines round about, to carry tidings unto their idols, and to the people.
target: Ɓe ɓofti kuuje Sawulu, ɓe ta'i hoore maako, ɓe kooci balmi maako. Nden ɓe neli koo toy nder lesdi Filisti'en ngam yahrugo habaru jaalorgal man yeeso labbi maɓɓe e haa yimɓe fuu.

source: And they put his armour in the house of their gods, and fastened his head in the temple of Dagon.
target: Ɓe ndesi balmi Sawulu nder suudu labbi maɓɓe, ɓe tiggi gumbal hoore maako haa suudu lawru maɓɓe Daagon.

source: And when all Jabesh–gilead heard all that the Philistines had done to Saul,
target: Yimɓe Yaabes nder lesdi Gile'at fuu nani ko Filisti'en mbaɗi Sawulu fuu.

source: They arose, all the valiant men, and took away the body of Saul, and the bodies of his sons, and brought them to Jabesh, and buried their bones under the oak in Jabesh, and fasted seven days.
target: Worɓe maɓɓe semmbiɗɓe fuu njehi, koo'i ɓanndu Sawulu e ɓalli ɓiɓɓe muuɗum, ɓe koori ɗi haa Yaabes. Nden ɓe uwi i'e maɓɓe les lekki makki haa Yaabes, ɓe cuumi nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi.

source: So Saul died for his transgression which he committed against the  Lord , even against the word of the  Lord , which he kept not, and also for asking counsel of one that had a familiar spirit, to enquire of it;
target: Bana nii Sawulu maayi ngam o yewi umroore Jawmiraawo, ngam o hakkilanaay wolde Jawmiraawo, o yehi o ƴami carwoowo maayɓe boo ,

source: And enquired not of the  Lord : therefore he slew him, and turned the kingdom unto David the son of Jesse.
target: o ƴamaay Jawmiraawo. Ngam maajum Jawmiraawo halki mo, hokki Daawuda ɓii Yessa laamu.

source: Then all Israel gathered themselves to David unto Hebron, saying, Behold, we are thy bone and thy flesh.
target: Isra'iila'en fuu mooɓti haa kommbi Daawuda haa Heburuun. Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Minin min banndiraaɓe ma nder ummaatoore woore.

source: And moreover in time past, even when Saul was king, thou wast he that leddest out and broughtest in Israel: and the  Lord  thy God said unto thee, Thou shalt feed my people Israel, and thou shalt be ruler over my people Israel.
target: Koo naane, wakkati Sawulu ɗonno laamani min boo, an ardi jama'aare konu Isra'iila. Jawmiraawo Allah maaɗa boo wi'i ma: An ɗowata ummaatoore am Isra'iila'en, a laatoto ardiiɗo maɓɓe.”

source: Therefore came all the elders of Israel to the king to Hebron; and David made a covenant with them in Hebron before the  Lord ; and they anointed David king over Israel, according to the word of the  Lord  by Samuel.
target: Ndotti'en Isra'iila fuu ngari haa laamiiɗo haa Heburuun. Daawuda haɓɓi alkawal bee maɓɓe ton yeeso Jawmiraawo. Ɓe moyti Daawuda, laati laamiiɗo dow Isra'iila fodde wolde nde Jawmiraawo wi'no bee hunnduko Samuyila.

source: And David and all Israel went to Jerusalem, which is Jebus; where the Jebusites were, the inhabitants of the land.
target: Daawuda e Isra'iila'en fuu njehi haa Urusaliima, waato Yebus. Yebusi'en, yimɓe lesdi man ɗon njooɗi ton .

source: And the inhabitants of Jebus said to David, Thou shalt not come hither. Nevertheless David took the castle of Zion, which is the city of David.
target: Ɓe mbi'i Daawuda: “A waawataa nyaamugo berniwol amin.” Ammaa Daawuda nyaami berniwol cemmbiɗŋgol dow hooseere Siyona, kaŋgol laati Berniwol Daawuda.

source: And David said, Whosoever smiteth the Jebusites first shall be chief and captain. So Joab the son of Zeruiah went first up, and was chief.
target: Daawuda wi'no: “Mo aartata jaalaago Yebusi'en fuu laatoto hooreejo, waato mawɗo honooɓe.” Yo'ab ɓii Seruyatu aarti, wa'i. Kaŋko laati hooreejo.

source: And David dwelt in the castle; therefore they called it the city of David.
target: Daawuda jooɗi haa berniwol cemmbiɗŋgol go, ngam maajum ɓe inndi ngol Berniwol Daawuda.

source: And he built the city round about, even from Millo round about: and Joab repaired the rest of the city.
target: Daawuda nyiɓi haa taarde berniwol, diga Millo  haa yotti taarde maagol. Yo'ab boo hesɗitini yeɓre berniwol luttunde.

source: So David waxed greater and greater: for the  Lord  of hosts was with him.
target: Daawuda ɓesdi yeeso yeeso, ngam Jawmiraawo, Allah honooɓe asama ɗon wondi bee maako.

source: These also are the chief of the mighty men whom David had, who strengthened themselves with him in his kingdom, and with all Israel, to make him king, according to the word of the  Lord  concerning Israel.
target: Ndaa honooɓe Daawuda hoore'en suusɓe. Kamɓe e Isra'iila fuu mballi Daawuda haa o heɓa laamu e ɓe tokki wallugo mo nde o laami fuu, bana Jawmiraawo wi'no dow Isra'iila.

source: And this is the number of the mighty men whom David had; Jashobeam, an Hachmonite, the chief of the captains: he lifted up his spear against three hundred slain by him at one time.
target: Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe: Yasobo'am ɓii Hakmoni, o hooreejo honooɓe tataɓo. O mbari konne'en teemeɗɗe tato  bee labbo maako nder haɓre woore.

source: And after him was Eleazar the son of Dodo, the Ahohite, who was one of the three mighties.
target: Ɓaawo maako Eli'azaaru ɓii Doodo Ahohiijo, o gooto nder suusɓe tato.

source: He was with David at Pas–dammim, and there the Philistines were gathered together to battle, where was a parcel of ground full of barley; and the people fled from before the Philistines.
target: Kaŋko o wonduno bee Daawuda haa Pas-Damiima, nde Filisti'en mooɓi ton ngam haɓre. Woodi ton tayre ngesa heewnde sa'iiruuri. Yimɓe ndoggi yeeso Filisti'en.

source: And they set themselves in the midst of that parcel, and delivered it, and slew the Philistines; and the  Lord  saved them by a great deliverance.
target: Ammaa Eli'azaaru bee yimɓe mum ndari caka tayre ngesa man, ɓe kisni nde, ɓe njaali Filisti'en. Bana nii Jawmiraawo heɓni Isra'iila'en jaalorgal maŋngal.

source: Now three of the thirty captains went down to the rock to David, into the cave of Adullam; and the host of the Philistines encamped in the valley of Rephaim.
target: Tato nder honooɓe semmbiɗɓe cappanɗe tato ndiirti, ngari haa Daawuda haa lowol Adullam nder tapaare. Jama'aare Filisti'en ɗon saŋngini nder waadiwol Refayim.

source: And David was then in the hold, and the Philistines' garrison was then at Beth–lehem.
target: Saa'i man Daawuda ɗon haa hisrude, Filisti'en aynooɓe ɗon haa Baytilaama.

source: And David longed, and said, Oh that one would give me drink of the water of the well of Beth–lehem, that is at the gate!
target: Daawuda yeli, wi'i: “Moy yarnatammi ndiyam ɓulndu wonndu haa dammugal Baytilaama?”

source: And the three brake through the host of the Philistines, and drew water out of the well of Beth–lehem, that was by the gate, and took it, and brought it to David: but David would not drink of it, but poured it out to the  Lord ,
target: Suusɓe tato man nasti caka saŋngeere Filisti'en, nyeɗi ndiyam ɓulndu haa dammugal Baytilaama, ngaddi ɗam haa Daawuda. Ammaa Daawuda sali yarugo ɗam. O rufi ɗam, ɗam laati dokkal ngam Jawmiraawo.

source: And said, My God forbid it me, that I should do this thing: shall I drink the blood of these men that have put their lives in jeopardy? for with the jeopardy of their lives they brought it. Therefore he would not drink it. These things did these three mightiest.
target: O wi'i: “Allah am haɗammi waɗugo irin ɗu'um! Kadi mi yara ƴiiƴam worɓe ɓe'e na? Ngam ɓe kasdi koo maayugo ngam waddango yam ndiyam man.” Ngam maajum o sali yarugo ɗam. Bana nii kuuɗe suusɓe tato ɓe'e mba'i.

source: And Abishai the brother of Joab, he was chief of the three: for lifting up his spear against three hundred, he slew them, and had a name among the three.
target: Abisay deerɗiraawo Yo'ab woni hooreejo suusɓe tato man. O mbari konne'en teemeɗɗe tato bee labbo maako. O heɓi innde caka suusɓe tato,

source: Of the three, he was more honourable than the two; for he was their captain: howbeit he attained not to the first three.
target: o ɓurdi ɓe tedduŋgal cowi ɗiɗi, haa o laati hooreejo maɓɓe. Ammaa o yottaaki darnde suusɓe tato go.

source: Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, the son of a valiant man of Kabzeel, who had done many acts; he slew two lionlike men of Moab: also he went down and slew a lion in a pit in a snowy day.
target: Benaya ɓii Yoyada mo Kabseyel, o cemmbiɗɗo, o huuwi kuuɗe mawɗe ɗuuɗɗe. O mbari ɓiɓɓe Ariyel Mo'abiijo ɗiɗo. Nyannde feere nde mallimallooje toɓi, o jippi nder ɓulndu o mbari mbarooga ton.

source: And he slew an Egyptian, a man of great stature, five cubits high; and in the Egyptian's hand was a spear like a weaver's beam; and he went down to him with a staff, and plucked the spear out of the Egyptian's hand, and slew him with his own spear.
target: O mbari boo Misraajo mo darnde mum waɗi meetir ɗiɗi bee reeta. Misraajo man woodi labbo haa juŋngo muuɗum, ngo tekki bana leggal cannyargal. Benaya ɓaditi mo bee sawru, jaɓti labbo haa juŋngo maako, mbari mo bee maago.

source: These things did Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, and had the name among the three mighties.
target: Kanjum Benaya ɓii Yoyada waɗi. O heɓi innde bana suusɓe tato go.

source: Behold, he was honourable among the thirty, but attained not to the first three: and David set him over his guard.
target: O ɓurdi suusɓe cappanɗe tato go tedduŋgal, ammaa o yottaaki darnde suusɓe tato. Daawuda darni mo o hooreejo aynooɓe muuɗum.

source: Also the valiant men of the armies were, Asahel the brother of Joab, Elhanan the son of Dodo of Beth–lehem,
target: Honooɓe Daawuda semmbiɗɓe ngoni: Asa'el deerɗiraawo Yo'ab e Elhanan ɓii Doodo mo Baytilaama

source: Shammoth the Harorite, Helez the Pelonite,
target: e Sammot mo Harood e Heeles mo Pelon

source: Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite, Abi–ezer the Anathothite,
target: e Iira ɓii Ikkes mo Teko'a e Abi'ezer mo Anatot

source: Sibbecai the Hushathite, Ilai the Ahohite,
target: e Sibbekay mo Husa e Iilay mo Ahoha

source: Maharai the Netophathite, Heled the son of Baanah the Netophathite,
target: e Maharay mo Netofa e Heeled ɓii Ba'ana mo Netofa

source: Ithai the son of Ribai of Gibeah, that pertained to the children of Benjamin, Benaiah the Pirathonite,
target: e Ittay ɓii Ribay mo Gibiya nder lesdi Benyamin e Benaya mo Piraton

source: Hurai of the brooks of Gaash, Abiel the Arbathite,
target: e Huuray iwɗo waadiiji Ga'as e Abiyel mo Araba

source: Azmaveth the Baharumite, Eliahba the Shaalbonite,
target: e Azmawet mo Baharuuma, Elihabba mo Sa'albon

source: The sons of Hashem the Gizonite, Jonathan the son of Shage the Hararite,
target: e ɓiɓɓe Hasen Guniijo e Yonatan ɓii Sage mo Harar

source: Ahiam the son of Sacar the Hararite, Eliphal the son of Ur,
target: e Ahiyam ɓii Sakar mo Harar e Elifal ɓii Ur

source: Hepher the Mecherathite, Ahijah the Pelonite,
target: e Hefer Mekeraajo e Ahiya mo Pelon

source: Hezro the Carmelite, Naarai the son of Ezbai,
target: e Hesro mo Karmel e Na'aray ɓii Ejebay

source: Joel the brother of Nathan, Mibhar the son of Haggeri,
target: e Yo'el deerɗiraawo Natan e Mibehar ɓii Hagari

source: Zelek the Ammonite, Naharai the Berothite, the armourbearer of Joab the son of Zeruiah,
target: e Selek Ammooniijo e Naharay mo Beerot doondoowo balmi Yo'ab ɓii Seruyatu

source: Ira the Ithrite, Gareb the Ithrite,
target: e Iira mo Yatir e Gareb mo Yatir

source: Uriah the Hittite, Zabad the son of Ahlai,
target: e Uriya Hetiijo e Zabada ɓii Ahilay

source: Adina the son of Shiza the Reubenite, a captain of the Reubenites, and thirty with him,
target: e Adina ɓii Sija, mawɗo nder yimɓe Ruben e worɓe cappanɗe tato bee maako

source: Hanan the son of Maachah, and Joshaphat the Mithnite,
target: e Hanan ɓii Ma'aka e Yosafat Mitimiijo

source: Uzzia the Ashterathite, Shama and Jehiel the sons of Hothan the Aroerite,
target: e Uzziya mo Asterot e Sama e Ye'iyel ɓiɓɓe Hotam mo Aro'er

source: Jediael the son of Shimri, and Joha his brother, the Tizite,
target: e Yedi'ayel ɓii Simiri e deerɗum Yoha Tisiijo

source: Eliel the Mahavite, and Jeribai, and Joshaviah, the sons of Elnaam, and Ithmah the Moabite,
target: e Eliyel Mahawiijo e Yeribay e Yoswiya ɓiɓɓe Elna'am e Yitima Mo'abiijo

source: Eliel, and Obed, and Jasiel the Mesobaite.
target: e Eliyel e Obet e Ya'asiyel mo Mecobaya.

source: Now these are they that came to David to Ziklag, while he yet kept himself close because of Saul the son of Kish: and they were among the mighty men, helpers of the war.
target: Saa'i Daawuda ɗonno suuɗo haa Cikilak ngam haa o daɗa Sawulu ɓii Kis, honooɓe semmbiɗɓe woɗɓe ngari haa maako, mballi mo nder konu.

source: They were armed with bows, and could use both the right hand and the left in hurling stones and shooting arrows out of a bow, even of Saul's brethren of Benjamin.
target: Ɓe ngoodi lagaaje e piwli, ɓe mbaawi fiɗugo kuri e kaa'e bee juŋngo nyaamo koo nano boo. Ɓe banndiraaɓe Sawulu mo Benyamin. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe:

source: The chief was Ahiezer, then Joash, the sons of Shemaah the Gibeathite; and Jeziel, and Pelet, the sons of Azmaveth; and Berachah, and Jehu the Anathothite,
target: Ahi'ezer, hooreejo maɓɓe e Yo'as ɓiɓɓe Sema'a mo Gibiya e Yesiyel e Pelet ɓiɓɓe Azmawet e Bereka e Yeehu mo Anatot

source: And Ismaiah the Gibeonite, a mighty man among the thirty, and over the thirty; and Jeremiah, and Jahaziel, and Johanan, and Josabad the Gederathite,
target: e Yisma'ya mo Gibiyon, o gooto nder suusɓe cappanɗe tato go, ɓurɗo ɓe fuu

source: Eluzai, and Jerimoth, and Bealiah, and Shemariah, and Shephatiah the Haruphite,
target: e Yeremiya e Yahajiyel e Yohanan e Yozabat mo Gedera

source: Elkanah, and Jesiah, and Azareel, and Joezer, and Jashobeam, the Korhites,
target: e Ele'ujay e Yerimot e Be'aliya e Semariya e Sefatiya mo Haruf

source: And Joelah, and Zebadiah, the sons of Jeroham of Gedor.
target: e Elkaana e Yissiya e Azareyel e Yo'ejer e Yasobo'am, ɓe Koora'en

source: And of the Gadites there separated themselves unto David into the hold to the wilderness men of might, and men of war fit for the battle, that could handle shield and buckler, whose faces were like the faces of lions, and were as swift as the roes upon the mountains;
target: e Yo'ela e Zebadiya, ɓiɓɓe Yeroham mo Gedor.

source: Ezer the first, Obadiah the second, Eliab the third,
target: Yimɓe Gada woɗɓe ndilli, kawti bee Daawuda haa hisrude muuɗum nder ladde. Ɓe honooɓe semmbiɗɓe nder jama'aare konu. Ɓe mari baawal huuwtinirgo bawarɗe  mawɗe e labbe, geese maɓɓe nanndi bee geese barooɗe, ɓe mbaawi doggugo bana lelji. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe:

source: Mishmannah the fourth, Jeremiah the fifth,
target: Ezer, o hooreejo maɓɓe, Obadiya ɗiɗaɓo, Eliyabu tataɓo,

source: Attai the sixth, Eliel the seventh,
target: Mismana nayaɓo, Yeremiya njowaɓo,

source: Johanan the eighth, Elzabad the ninth,
target: Attay njoweegoojo, Eliyel njoweeɗiɗaɓo,

source: Jeremiah the tenth, Machbanai the eleventh.
target: Yohanan njoweetataɓo, Elzabat njoweenayaɓo,

source: These were of the sons of Gad, captains of the host: one of the least was over an hundred, and the greatest over a thousand.
target: Yeremiya sappoojo, Makabanay sappo e ngo'oojo.

source: These are they that went over Jordan in the first month, when it had overflown all his banks; and they put to flight all them of the valleys, both toward the east, and toward the west.
target: Yimɓe Gada ɓe'e ngoni mawɓe konu, pamaro maɓɓe ɓuri yimɓe teemerre, mawɗo boo ɓuri yimɓe ujineere.

source: And there came of the children of Benjamin and Judah to the hold unto David.
target: Kamɓe ɓe eeri maayo Urdun nder lewru aranndu, saa'i ngo teelata  dow pomoole maago. Ɓe ndiiwi jooɗiiɓe waadiiji fuu haa fuunaaŋge e hiirnaaŋge.

source: And David went out to meet them, and answered and said unto them, If ye be come peaceably unto me to help me, mine heart shall be knit unto you: but if ye be come to betray me to mine enemies, seeing there is no wrong in mine hands, the God of our fathers look thereon, and rebuke it.
target: Yimɓe Benyamin e yimɓe Yahuuda woɗɓe ngari haa hisrude Daawuda.

source: Then the spirit came upon Amasai, who was chief of the captains, and he said, Thine are we, David, and on thy side, thou son of Jesse: peace, peace be unto thee, and peace be to thine helpers; for thy God helpeth thee. Then David received them, and made them captains of the band.
target: Daawuda wurti, fotti bee maɓɓe, wi'i ɓe: “To jam waddi on haa ɗo haa on mballammi kam, mi jaɓan on bee ɓernde woore, ammaa to on ngari ngam zammbaago yam e wallugo konne'en am, koo to mi waɗaay aybe sam, nden kam sey Allah kaakiraaɓe meeɗen laara ɗum, hiito on!”

source: And there fell some of Manasseh to David, when he came with the Philistines against Saul to battle: but they helped them not: for the lords of the Philistines upon advisement sent him away, saying, He will fall to his master Saul to the jeopardy of our heads.
target: Nden Ruuhu Allah naŋngi Amasay, hooreejo suusɓe cappanɗe tato go, o wi'i: “Min yimɓe ma Daawuda! Min ngondan bee ma, ɓii Yeesa! Jam, jam laatano ma! Jam laatano wallooɓe ma, ngam Allah maaɗa ɗon walle!” Nden Daawuda jaɓɓi ɓe, darni ɓe ɓe mawɓe dow mooɓre hippooɓe muuɗum.

source: As he went to Ziklag, there fell to him of Manasseh, Adnah, and Jozabad, and Jediael, and Michael, and Jozabad, and Elihu, and Zilthai, captains of the thousands that were of Manasseh.
target: Yimɓe Manassa woɗɓe boo ndilli, kawti bee Daawuda, wakkati o wardi bee Filisti'en ngam haɓugo bee Sawulu. Ammaa ɓe mballaay Filisti'en, ngam laamiiɓe Filisti'en carwootiri, mbi'i: “O tammi lortaago haa jawmiiko Sawulu, o mbara yimɓe meeɗen, o ta'a ko'e maɓɓe.” Ngam maajum ɓe njaɓɓiti mo.

source: And they helped David against the band of the rovers: for they were all mighty men of valour, and were captains in the host.
target: Nde o lorti haa Cikilak, Manassa'en ɓe'e kawti bee maako: Adanaha e Yozabat e Yedi'ayel e Mika'iilu e Yozabat e Elihu e Cillitay, ɓe ardiiɓe dow honooɓe ujineere nder lenyol Manassa.

source: For at that time day by day there came to David to help him, until it was a great host, like the host of God.
target: Ɓe mballi Daawuda haɓugo bee mooɓre hippooɓe, ngam ɓe fuu ɓe honooɓe semmbiɗɓe, ɓe laati mawɓe nder jama'aare konu.
